comments: I loved playing this. It seems this game has multiple locations you can visit and play them at different levels; there are 4 levels. The 1st location is free. While the other locations are not. You need to buy the rest of the locations. In-game coins make this easy. The one thing that i did not like is it is not a completely offline game. Some of the perks needs internet for you to use it. I don't know if it was just mine. The hand drawn maps was only for the 1st location.

I really like this game! The only issue I have is that every time I play, a pop-up appears that says that the game requires Google Play Games, I think it's called, whenever I click on one of the chapters. I don't have any trouble playing the game itself, it's the Google Play Games pop-up that's annoying me. You should be able to play a free game without being harassed about downloading a separate app when you can still play the game without it.

It's really thrilling and scary and so cool at the same time well the first time I play I thought the girl has a body and the head icon is the only one to be there but when I saw her I died well it's still COOL love this game so all of them are just head and there's a dog too and more challenging options this gotta be the best game cool really cool and the girl with only a head was really unexpected 🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣 the best game i love horror games too well this one is thrilling
100% great just that when you make a ghost can you add an option to save the creation and can you make the characters/maps all play able for free I wouldn't want to spend money (not an fake review

One of the Best scary apps in android..but u guys have to do some new challenges or new maps i mean bigger maps ..like if u got 20/20 money u go outside and u keep playing to get a car to run away or somthing like that

title: Airport City
description:
Airport City is much more than your average simulator. It takes the best of two worlds in just the right proportions: the sense of adventure from airplane games, and the need to plan strategically from the city building games. If you’re starting to think that there are things beyond farming, put your farm sim on hold and start building your town that will gradually become a city with the best airport in the world! We know how plane games can become repetitive over time, so we are constantly improving this city building sim, to ensure that our players are always engaged, both on the ground and in the air.
Whether you want to try out the role of an air tycoon or an airline commander, you’ll find something to love about Airport City.
Build a modern international-class terminal to send an airplane to whichever corner of the world you want. Just get your plane in the air and choose where it lands. To make your travels memorable, you can bring back rare artifacts and unique collections. See how many souvenirs can fit in one plane!
But it’s not just a flight simulator—you’ll have to apply your outstanding management skills to develop all the supporting infrastructure too! Take care of an entire city next to it, to provide your airport all the required services. And if the Earth one day becomes too small for you, build a launchpad and send rockets to outer space!
If what you’re looking for in city building games is peaceful gameplay and interactions, this sim is exactly what you need. Here you start from a small town and develop it into a great modern city!
Social features are also an important part of the game. You can create alliances with other players to complete joint quests and participate in competitions. Just find a fellow airline commander from a neighboring city and make your gaming experience twice as much fun! The regular updates with new models of aircraft, buildings and new destinations, will become an infinite source of entertainment.
Download Airport City and see for yourself how this flight simulator stands out among other airplane games and city building games.
✔ Test your airline commander skills and develop your own airport. Erect a huge terminal to send your planes to different parts of the world, then construct a launchpad to explore outer space!
✔ Take on the role of the ultimate airline tycoon. Build a town, upgrade it to a unique city unlike all the others, and collect profits to support the needs of the airport. If you can handle a farm or a restaurant, you can surely handle an awesome terminal!
✔ Enjoy managing an international transport hub, with lots of unique buildings and travel destinations. Improve infrastructure to increase the number of travelers.
✔ Interact with like-minded players who enjoy flight simulators and airplane games just like you. Create alliances and participate in special events. Be the famous business tycoon you always wanted to be!
✔ Explore the world with your plane. Travel to your favorite destinations and bring home unique collections.

Facebook Community: http://www.facebook.com/AirportCityOfficialPage
Trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VVvTQhSIFds
Privacy Policy: http://www.game-insight.com/site/privacypolicy
Terms of Service: http://www.game-insight.com/en/site/terms



Discover new titles from GameInsight: http://game-insight.com

recentChanges:
DARK SKIES
Halloween’s coming to Airport City! Phantoms are appearing all around town, and there are Ghost Planes in the sky. Help the citizens, complete collections, find Ectoplasm and get the grand Forsaken Abbey!

Fixes and Improvements
* Added a plane purchasing animation!
* Now bonuses are all in a separate store
* Fixed the bug with the Campus Park
comments: 4 stars only because planes can back into each other, bump into each other and sometimes go through each other depending on what planes and how many planes are in que. Also, making enough money to expand or upgrade is way too slow. The more I ply, the less I like this game. Getting what you need is really based on how much time you play the game at one time. Two stars now. This game is no longer fun to play. It's a chore.

This game has improved it is still slow going unless you spend real dollars but now the bonus is that every 14 days you get one game dollar so there is the chance to advance even thought it is slow, it is now possible. Bad thing for me is now I am tempted to spend real funds to get to my goals quicker.

I'm glad I didn't spend any money on the game for 2 reasons. 1)it really is not necessary to spend money if you're just a little patient. It does have advertising which you can watch instead of spending on the game. 2)I've got a Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus which is an above average smartphone in terms of its capabilities but the game frequently glitches necessitating closing & restarting which is a problem. Worse is that the developers don't acknowledge issues when reported. It's fun & addictive tho

Since the latest update I'm not able to use my own comfort classes, only the free ones in every few hours. There's no possibility to use mine outside these free times. Also hawk planes often get stuck at the end of the runway and I have to close the game to make them go away. Takes an awful long time to collect coins.

I LOVE this game. It is so involved and there is so much going on that once you level up a few times and you've got say 3 ore more planes and a couple of helicopters, you can literally stay busy constantly collecting passengers, money, exp. points etc...... that you can actually "play" the game for hours and your eyes and fingers never leave the screen. The special collections are so cool!! The only thing I don't like about it is a cost a lot of coins to upgrade buildings, buy aircraft etc.

title: Choices: Stories You Play
description:
One choice can change everything! With romance, drama, horror and more, Choices has the best collection of story games in the world!
✦ Customize your main character
✦ Fall in love, solve crimes and embark on epic fantasy adventures
✦ Pick your story from our constantly growing library with weekly chapter updates
✦ Control what happens next in immersive visual stories!

Current stories include:

❖ THE FRESHMAN - Welcome to Hartfeld University! In this college drama, you’ll make new friends for life and find true love romancing your schoolmates. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress your character in fashion-forward outfits for events like a sorority rush.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.

❖ THE CROWN & THE FLAME - Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown! Assume the role of the hero in this interactive narrative adventure.

- Form alliances and relationships to build your army.
- Dress in elegant fashions and powerful armor.
- Crush enemies in an epic battle!

❖ PERFECT MATCH - Sign up for the high-tech matchmaking services of Eros Incorporated, and master the dating game! Create your look, meet your perfect match, and fall in love in this thrilling mystery story!

- Customize your date to be your perfect match.
- Roleplay as a guy or a girl.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won’t see coming!

You might also love:

ABOUT US

Choices is from the team that has been bringing you narrative games for over a decade. Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

Stay tuned for more new interactive story games to pick from in Choices!

- The Pixelberry Team

recentChanges:
RISING TIDES: When a natural disaster hits your town, your sister insists it's related to climate change. But will the town listen?

NEW CHAPTERS EACH WEEK
Prepare for a new year in high school in My Two First Loves! Then gear up and get ready for new chapters of Open Heart, The Royal Heir, and Rising Tides!
comments: The stories are really good, and the charater designs look nice. The only thing is I wish there were no gem choices. It makes it hard to play the game the way you want, and the only way to get them is from reading chapters or ads. I can eventually get enough for some choices but it takes a while. The VIP subscription is really expensive too. Still, it's a good game with no pop up ads, And therr are a lot of different stories of many genres to choose from!

Everything about this game is great — the stories, the characters, the graphics, the music. But I am giving it two stars because the pricing model is terrible. Each chapter of each book typically contains three premium choices which tend to cost 15+ "diamonds" each. The only effective way to get diamonds is to spend actual cash — even if you pay the $15 a month for VIP, you get only 10 additional diamonds a day. VIPs don't even get a discount on diamond packages. Sad.

I love this game, but the only problem is when it comes to keys and gems. When you don't wanna pay for these things you end up having to wait FOREVER for them to re-gen. I see a way to fix this as being able to re-gen 5 keys instead of just 2, or make the keys re-gen faster. For the gems maybe they could give out 5 gems every 12 or so hours instead of 24. Overall the game is great, and these are the only problems I have with it.

It is a fun game just costs too much to be able to make the good choices. Should have more options available at least for the closet without having to use so many. Should be more ways to get more free diamonds or make the choices with having to use less of them. There should be way more options to get way more diamonds especially for VIPs. But no there isn't. Everything costs. Or you have to wait forever to build up enough diamonds to even finish a chapter. Not right.

This game is addictive. I loved it very much but the Graphics are blurry when it comes to the real part of love making. The developers should work on it and make the conversation more lengthy and seductive instead of going directly to love making. Moreover, the sound effects and music needs improvement by adding moaning, crying and laughing and ecstasy sounds to the game so that one should feel he/she is actually itself a character and not a spectator. 18 plus version is also needs to be added.

title: TSheets Time Tracker
description:
Manage time & log hours with ease! TSheets time tracker for work is a cloud-based time tracking and scheduling app for employees that allows them to clock in and out each work day from their smartphones. With TSheets as the work clock, employees can easily track work hours, create a work log and even track PTO - More than your usual time clock app.

ONLINE TIMESHEETS ⏲️
 Time logging has never been easier - The TSheets time clock app allows you to replace paper timesheets with accurate, electronic time data and makes payroll and invoicing faster and more affordable. The TSheets time tracking app also accurately tracks time and GPS locations. So, why track work hours manually? Install this time clock app, calculate timesheets automatically and manage time for quick bookkeeping with the best time tracking software. 

SOPHISTICATED TIME RECORDING ⏲️
Here are some features that make TSheets the best app for tracking work hours: use TSheets time clock features - clock in and out to track work hours, change job codes, edit digital timesheets, view time tracking reports and changes to the work schedule and even track PTO. Time recording is easy with this time tracker app.
• Track time against multi-level job codes, projects, locations, clients, and more.
• Track employee hours accurately with a real-time online time clock.
• Easily switch between job codes, pause time tracking, or take a break.

MANAGE TIME ⏲️
The TSheets time tracker makes time management a breeze for employers. Save, on average, 6% on gross payroll costs and save three hours per week managing employee time.
TRACK TIME: 
• Edit, delete, or approve timesheets online to create a time log.
• Track vacation time, sick time, and holiday time accruals for employees.
REPORT TIME:
• View time tracker timer history with map.
• Easily access a breakdown of employee hours by employee, job, customer, or location.
• Get notifications if employees don’t clock in to a job or shift as scheduled or approach overtime limits.
• See day and week totals at a glance.
• Keep a black-box history of all timesheet edits and deletions, in case of an audit.

SCHEDULE ANYWHERE ⏲️
The TSheets time tracker also features in-app employee scheduling that allows employers to manage a schedule anywhere and anytime. Features include: drag and drop shifts, assign jobs, and send alerts to managers if employees haven’t clocked in as scheduled.
• Schedule builder: Schedule by job or by shift.
• In-app work scheduling lets employees easily clock in and clock out of assigned jobs or shifts right from the schedule.
• Notifications let employees know when a new work schedule is published or if a shift is changed.

SIGN UP ⏲️
This time tracking and scheduling app requires a TSheets account. Sign up now on the app or at https://www.tsheets.com for a free trial with no credit card required. (Or if you have just 1 user, sign up for a free account!)

ALSO INCLUDED ⏲️
• Seamless integrations with QuickBooks Online and QuickBooks for PC (Pro, Premier, and Enterprise) for quick bookkeeping.
• QuickBooks, Square, and Gusto integrations (and more!) to simplify your back office processes.
• Sync your schedule with Apple iCal, Microsoft Outlook, or Google Calendar for seamless time management.
• Integrations with popular payroll, accounting, invoicing software.
• Powerful, real-time reports in multiple formats (PDF, CSV, online, HTML).
• Safe data storage and detailed time logs protect you in the event of a labor dispute or audit.
• Configurations for DCAA/DOL compliance.
• Developer-open API.

SUPPORT, CUSTOMER RATED ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐
TSheets offers free unlimited phone, email, and chat support to all of our customers. Have a question? We’re happy to help! 

Customer Reviews: http://www.tsheets.com/reviews 
Phone: 888.836.2720
DIY Online Support: http://help.tsheets.com
Email: help@tsheets.com 
Webinars: Register for TSheets free, weekly webinars at https://www.tsheets.com/webinars

recentChanges: We squashed those pesky bugs that were causing the app to crash for some of you.
comments: Freezes up every time try to check week time clock and scroll through jobs. Makes checking in a pain in the a$$ Update... 3 updates in the few weeks and still bugs. I'm not able to balance out my crew because I cant check week totals. All these changes to this app are making me want to find a new program.

Ever since they updated with qb security, it takes way too long to log in. Why do I need a verification code EVERY TIME I log in! It's as bad as QuickBooks now. My bank doesn't require a verification code every single time and they are infinitely way more important than QuickBooks or Tsheets. You guys act like you need this much security. Qb is a terrible company. I hope I find another service soon so I can dump them.

After the Tsheets has joined with Intuit it has locked myself and most of my staff out. As we use it for payroll you can imagine the headache. Periodic downtimes, schedule duplication if you have it on separate devices, or making changes that simply disappear are all common issues. Not clocking out or back in or from job to job is an issue for the field as well. I and my office spend more time on this app than needed to. Use another service.

So far this app has been great. Only had it crash once, but once the update came in it was fixed. The only tiny issue i have now is when i clock in it delays a minute before clocking me in causing me to be a minute late. However i'm not entirely sure if that's the app or just my phone.

Horrible since Quickbooks bought the company. I have been a Tsheets user for 3 years. Before QB, it was wonderful and had immediate phone support. QB's made changes to login and have to generate a QB account and even then they email you a verification code every time you try and login. There is no longer any telephone support and have pushed everyone to online chat. My last chat experience took 38 minutes to get a hold of someone.

title: Pro Taxi Driving : City Car Driver Simulator 2020
description:
Its time to fasten your seat belt and get ready for the crazy taxi driver 3d experience with extreme taxi cab driving skills to pick and drop passengers to their destination in Pro TAXI Driver Crazy Car Rush game.  Speed up your taxi car, drive through the big city traffic, pick up the passengers and drop them off at their destinations in this top taxi simulator games. Get crazy with your taxi drive, speed, and drift in city taxi driver 3D. This is an amazing taxi games with taxi driving and customer transport driving games simulator. Not only you play as a simple taxi cab driver 3d but you drive like crazy on the street with traffic while you chase down criminals. Yes, feel the duty of a cop when your customer is a gangster in this taxi driving games. Taxi driving games gets more exciting with this brand new Pro TAXI Driver Crazy Car Rush game. An extreme city crazy taxi driving simulator concept with furious taxi driving in passenger pick & drop missions. The passengers are waiting, so hurry up in this Pro TAXI Driver Crazy Car Rush game.

This is like driving school games for those who want to learn crazy driving on roads with traffic rush. The real duty is to build a living with your taxi driving duty of city taxi driver 3d games in  Pro TAXI Driver Crazy Car Rush game. A real driving game simulator with multiple transport tasks and a chance to show your taxi driving skills. Top speed taxi cab driving and drift while police chasing your cab in taxi simulator. You are a taxi driver and your duty is to pick up all type of customers in this real taxi cab driving simulator.

Pro TAXI Driver Crazy Car Rush is a realistic car driving games for the driving simulator lovers. City car driving duty is a virtual job to pick up passengers and drive them with safety to their destination. With traffic around you need to be careful while driving in this taxi driver 3d taxi driving simulator. This extreme adventures taxi driving game will let you the experience the thrill of driving, parking and simulation. Take your car, fasten your seat belt and play the role of the taxi driver 3d. Pro TAXI Driver Crazy Car Rush is a fantastic game which uses realistic car physics and makes you feel like a real driver. If you are a big fan of cars driving and parking games then this Pro TAXI Driver Crazy Car Rush is the amazing choice for you.

• Smooth car controls and addictive gameplay
• Police Escape Challenging Levels of Driving & Racing

comments: The game was amazing. But when I hit level 12 it did not let me go to the next level. I played level 12 about 5 times. It only let me play levels 1-12. Then it said that I have to rate the game. When I rated the game, I went to the game to play again. But it said I have to rate but I already did. So I deleted the review and decided to write a really mean review. IF YOU WILL REGET IT. PLEASE DO NOT GET THE GAME.

At first this game was really fun, but then when i finished level 12 it asked me to rate it and there was no "later" option as there usually is so i rated the game and when i got back to the game to continue playing, i had to do the level all over again, so i did, and then the same thing happened after i finished the level for the second time. I am so angry. Defenitly deleting the game.

I love this game. Because of quarantine I have a lot of free time and this game helps m kill that time. I love that the ads are somewhat limited. The only thing I don't like is that is makes you watch an ad when you got the help buttun. Would definitely recommend 😉

Really good game. Excellent puzzles to solve 'em swiftly. So many details, so many colors and numbers. That's fine. Grafphic is 4/5, can be better, but that's ok. It is really funny to solve so many puzzles. But actually, there' re too less rooms, only 12. Am waiting for the next upd.

This is game is fun! Why? -because you can use your minds to solve many things and can play this game offline! What do you learn from it? -you learn many ways on life basics especially on how to do something or try to escape something. You learn many things and also this game helps you revise on what you do at school like knowing the numbers on the clock or auditioning number combinations you unlock this draw! You must download this app !

title: Raft Survival: Ocean Nomad - Simulator
description:
Ocean Nomad is a new release in the series of ocean survival games with new enemies, items, rpg elements, survival on an island and ocean exploration on a boat. Build and upgrade your raft for survival in the sea, defend it from sharks and explore the vast world around. Try all our awesome survival simulator games rolled into one! 

Features of our game:

☆hundreds of weapons and items
☆open world exploration
☆realistic 3D HD - graphics
☆survival on islands
☆improved raft building

Tips for apocalypse survival:

🌊Catch items and resources with you hook

Lots of useful resources in shark games are right under your nose. Chest and barrels floating around always contain vital resources for survival on in the sea and wreckages are really good material for raft building in ocean games. You might even find items, tools and weapons for defense of the raft, so keep on throwing the hook!

🔫Craft weapons and armor

A prey can easily change the rules and become a hunter in shark games. Make a hard choice among hundreds of guns, two - handed blade weapons and armor parts to defend you floating base and hunt sharks. Craft a perfect arsenal and always be ready for the battle. 

⛵️Defend your raft

Be ready to evolve and fight for survival in the sea with a double effort, now that you’ve got one more problem to deal with. The shark is now joined by swimmers from other survivor games and eager to attack the raft. No man can tame a shark and there’s nowhere to escape, so prepare for shooting and swinging all night and day long!

🔨Build and upgrade

Pay attention to the condition of your raft on the water in survival games in the ocean. It’s not enough to tie together a couple of wooden planks without a roof or even walls to feel safe. Be creative and expand the raft free in height and width, because the only limit for building in survival simulator games 2018 is your imagination. There’s also a lot of upgrades for fishing, storage space extension, that you can improve the floating shelter with to help you survive in the ocean.

🛶Explore the ocean

Ever wondered if there’s lost land with forest woods, jungle and animal pets in this ocean without end? An awesome feature of our island survival games free is now implemented in this one. Don’t sit idle — dare to explore the ocean and islands around. What do they hide: horror or glory, medieval royale treasures or wild tigers and scary dinosaurs from the jurassic age or even an old airplane wreckage? What's more you can find resources, upgrades for the raft and other items on the islands. You won’t need a ship or an ark to sail to them in shark games — a simple boat will do, and may the stars be your guide.

🌋Learn the story of the apocalypse

An unknown devastating cataclysm turned the world into an endless ocean and last survivors are locked on scattered islands like in prison, dreaming of finding their home. The quest of our raft game is to find them and discover the truth of what happened, find other people who could survive and join them.

🦈Survive on a raft

The latest release of our offline survival simulator games is full of evolved enemies, new items and other features that will surprise everybody. Download Ocean Nomad game and embark on an epic survival adventure. Play with no wifi or internet connection, last as many days as you can and share the results online with friends! 

*Attention:* We are not affiliated with the developers of the original Raft game.
Our company Treastone LTD has full rights to use the RAFT trademark in the USA (The Mark Consists of Standard Characters without claim to any particular font style, size or color - Ser. No. 87-605,582 FILED 09-12-2017)

🔫Craft weapons and armor

A prey can easily change the rules and become a hunter in shark games. Make a hard choice among hundreds of guns, two - handed blade weapons and armor parts to defend you floating base and hunt sharks. Craft a perfect arsenal and always be ready for the battle.

⛵️Defend your raft

Be ready to evolve and fight for survival in the sea with a double effort, now that you’ve got one more problem to deal with. The shark is now joined by swimmers from other survivor games and eager to attack the raft. No man can tame a shark and there’s nowhere to escape, so prepare for shooting and swinging all night and day long!

🔨Build and upgrade

Pay attention to the condition of your raft on the water in survival games in the ocean. It’s not enough to tie together a couple of wooden planks without a roof or even walls to feel safe. Be creative and expand the raft free in height and width, because the only limit for building in survival simulator games 2018 is your imagination. There’s also a lot of upgrades for fishing, storage space extension, that you can improve the floating shelter with to help you survive in the ocean.

🛶Explore the ocean

Ever wondered if there’s lost land with forest woods, jungle and animal pets in this ocean without end? An awesome feature of our island survival games free is now implemented in this one. Don’t sit idle — dare to explore the ocean and islands around. What do they hide: horror or glory, medieval royale treasures or wild tigers and scary dinosaurs from the jurassic age or even an old airplane wreckage? What's more you can find resources, upgrades for the raft and other items on the islands. You won’t need a ship or an ark to sail to them in shark games — a simple boat will do, and may the stars be your guide.

🌋Learn the story of the apocalypse

An unknown devastating cataclysm turned the world into an endless ocean and last survivors are locked on scattered islands like in prison, dreaming of finding their home. The quest of our raft game is to find them and discover the truth of what happened, find other people who could survive and join them.

🦈Survive on a raft

The latest release of our offline survival simulator games is full of evolved enemies, new items and other features that will surprise everybody. Download Ocean Nomad game and embark on an epic survival adventure. Play with no wifi or internet connection, last as many days as you can and share the results online with friends!

*Attention:* We are not affiliated with the developers of the original Raft game.
Our company Treastone LTD has full rights to use the RAFT trademark in the USA (The Mark Consists of Standard Characters without claim to any particular font style, size or color - Ser. No. 87-605,582 FILED 09-12-2017)
summary: Hundreds of items and parts to build your unique raft in survival games
developerAddress: Unit 4203, 30 Bloomsbury Street, Ground Floor, London, England, WC1B 3QJ
recentChanges:
Resources in the store are available for coins
New skill window
Increased sensitivity
Fix bugs
comments: Okay, I'm like level 22 now, it's a good game so props on that, only complaints I have are some of the islands aren't open yet, so idk how to fix the plane, I'm guessing that'll come with future updates, and for some reason there isn't a way to open the hangar on that science lab island, other than that, it's decent for a mobile game, plays pretty smoothly on my note 10+. good job guys

Controls is terrible. The dev didn't even appreciate player palm and finger size. The virtual joy pad simply too close to corner, its ridiculous for my thumb length and palm size. Movements are wierd. The island visit is nice n fun though, but kinda stupid. When u r drifting on a raft in ocean, n found tiny island with intact houses, why even bother to go back to raft n keep drifting again😂🤣. It couldn't stop me from laughing.🤣😂🤣

Edit: I have totally changed my review from 5 stars to 1 star because of one very disturbing thing. The new update (12/10/2020) has made my game terrible, when you go on survival, there is no shop icon and the map icon you cannot press anymore. When I go on create, it just has survival section, so that is not right. Developers, please read this review and respond to it because this is a very important message to fix this situation. Thanks.

Interesting but the opening screen does not play, so I select Skip. Game then plays. I have only played for a short time and the game seems to have a lot of potential. I have one problem so far. I keep hearing what sounds like the word HEAVY. Not sure what that means but it is driving me nuts. Does it mean I have too much stuff on the raft and need to increase the size of the raft? Please help as I would like to continue playing.

There is no purpose to this game. I played this game all summer. I built a massive fortress. I collected and crafted THOUSANDS of items. I really wanted more. The new update is a failure. All the developers did was change textures (looks very bad now). No new missions. No new game play. All they did was shrink one island and open a new one. Why add so many unnecessary things? 7 pop up windows to start the game? Very disappointing.

title: Doodle Jump
description:
Named Best of 2015 by Google Play editors! Thank you for all of your support.

One of the hottest mobile games of all time! Easy to pick up and play. Wildly addictive.
 
See for yourself why Touch Arcade called Doodle Jump “possibly the best [mobile] game ever created” and Macworld called it “a perfect micro-game, insanely addictive, and deliciously replayable.”
 
How high can you get?
Journey up a sheet of graph paper, perpetually jumping from one platform to the next, picking up jet packs, avoiding black holes, and blasting baddies with nose balls along the way. Laugh with delight as you blow past other players' actual score markers scribbled in the margins. And be warned: this game is insanely addictive!
 
Features:
-	Many fantastical worlds to play in - Ninja, Space, Jungle, Soccer, Underwater, Snow, Halloween, Frozen Ice, Easter and Pirates!
-	Awesome power-ups to pick-up (JET PACKs, PROPELLER HATS, ROCKETS, trampolines...)
-	Trippy obstacles to avoid (UFOs, black holes, and many, many monstrous monsters)
-	Mad platforms to jump on (Broken, moving, disappearing, shifting, EXPLODING…)
-	NEW! - More than 100 missions to complete for rewards
-	Global leaderboards, fun achievements! Beat your friends’ scores!

How to play: 
Tilt to move left or right, tap the screen to shoot. 


As seen on TV, movies, late-night and on tour with the most famous pop star in the world, find out why Doodle Jump is a true cultural phenomenon.

* BE WARNED: This game is INSANELY addictive! 
* Don't doodle jump and drive!


:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
If you bought Doodle Jump in the past, make sure you have it installed on your device* when you install this new version! That will remove the ads. If you have already uninstalled/deleted the old paid Doodle Jump version, you can re-download it from "My Android Apps" -> "Other apps in my library" or by going directly to: http://bit.ly/oldpaid  

* This will work for most devices, but unfortunately not the ones that the old paid version is not compatible with. We are trying to come up with a solution for those. 
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

recentChanges: New and improved tournaments! Gold rush! Treasure hunt! Monster rampage! And more!
comments: I've had this game for ~6 - 7 years (on other phones and google accounts) and it is definitely the best game to ever exist. It's very addictive, and a great game to play when, say, when you're waiting for the bus and so on. Basically just a nice game to have when you are bored, or whatever your reason is.

Back in my day, this game was free and didn't have any forsaken ads in it. But now if you don't wanna be beaten over the head with the same 2 ads, or have them obnoxiously shoved down your throat every 5 seconds, then of course, ya gotta buy it. And I know it's only a dollar, but I don't care, this game is not worth any price to me. And that's the problem I have with a lotta things nowadays. So Dear Corporations, STOP WITH THE ADS ALREADY! WE DON'T CARE ANYMORE! WE JUST WANNA PLAY STUPID GAMES!

Can u plz add bosses?! They'll each have, healthbars, a unique theme song, and different weapons and weaknesses. Speaking of weaknesses, they're either your nose balls, being jumped on, exploding platforms, propeller caps, or other obstacles u find in different words, and each boss only has 1 of those weaknesses. Shields will spawn a lot more frequently, so obviously the boss can't kill u, but they can however make your shield disappear with their weapons!

The game is good and removing ads costs only $1, but it lacks 18:9 support for most newer smartphones. Edit October 19th 2020: Game also will run on low power devices, and is working on my backup Galaxy S3

Best one handed time waster game ever! You're bored but don't want to start any long term game relationship!? Keep it casual. This is the game for you! I still occasionally play it and have had it on my phone for over 5 years!

title: 94% - Quiz, Trivia & Logic
description:
If I say "Something you eat with your hands," what comes to mind first? Hamburger? Corn on the cob? Ribs? In 94%, the object of the game is simple: find 94% of the given answers!

Try the third app from Scimob, the creaters of 94 Seconds and 94 Degrees with more than 25 million players worldwide!

Examples of questions:
The first thing you do in the morning
Something you don't have time to do
Animals hatched from an egg
Something that is often out of order

Download 94% today to discover hundreds of questions based on words, expressions and images!

comments: Used to love this game. Hadn't played in a little while and wanted to play again. Saying the ads are excessive is being kind. The free version didn't used to be like this. It's not even playable anymore and the only way to remove the obnoxious amount of ads is to get the subscription at $2.99/wk. Sadly 'Uninstall' is the best option.

This used to be one of my favorite games. Now they have added a completely excessive amount of ads. After every guess, right or wrong, I get an add. THIS WHOLE GAME HAS JUST BECOME NON-STOP ADDS. I spend more time now watching adds then playing the game. It takes me 3 seconds to make my new guess and type it...but then I get a 45 second long add🤬🤬🤬🤬

I have been playing this a lot lately, it's good fun and addictive. Some of the levels repeat (I just got exact same picture I've had before) but good variety overall. However the addition of ads popping up after guesses is really annoying. I could put up with it for hints or at the end of a level but it's really off-putting now. My other negative would be once you advance in the game you have to scroll all the way down every time. It would be nice to have a way to jump down to where you're at.

An ad after every guess?! What the hell people? I've played this game for quiet a while and have always enjoyed it. Now I'm uninstalling it because that is obnoxious that you feel the need to flood people with ads after every guess. Right or wrong. Doesn't matter. Here's an ad. Oh whats that? Another one? You sure? Its only been one word, but okay. BAM!!!! ANOTHER AD!!!!

Haven't played in a long time and decided to reinstall it. Mad at my self for doing it. There is an ad after each guess making it enjoyable like it use to be. Had to uninstall. Understand having ads but that was way to much.

title: Board Kings™️ - Multiplayer Board Games
description:
Roll the dice and build a board city in Board Kings, the coolest multiplayer board game!
Board Kings is the ultimate in online board games: play with your friends and destroy their game boards, while you grab the goods!

- Roll the dice to move around your board. It's your board game to play... and win!
- Build your own board city, grabbing coins as you go!  
- Travel to other players’ (and your friends’) boards...and…
- Steal their stuff! Go nuts and grab away! Until the next dice roll, that is...
- Unlock new boards from all that board hopping - Yellow Brick Road or the Train
- Add to your board game album - collect all the stickers for awesome prizes! 
- Upgrade your game board’s sections to level up to the next game board!
- Enjoy over 20 fun multiplayer board games, with more game boards added each update!

 Hourly Board Game Goodies, Freebies and more in Board Kings! 

Play the coolest free dice game and get board game goodies galore! Free rolls, coins, gems, special boards and more are up for grabs on every board game hop!

- Hourly free rolls every single day (and more board game goodies too)!
- Win special surprise bonuses as you play!
- Invite your friends for more goodies - it’s a social mobile board game!
- Roll the dice to build famous landmarks like the Eiffel Tower to your game board as you play

All is fair in love and board games - you could even call it a game of life! Board Kings is probably the best board game of all time! Play with your friends! 

 A Multiplayer Dice Game Where You Destroy (and Steal) Your Friends’ Stuff! 

Board Kings is one of the only multiplayer dice games where you can play with friends, then destroy and steal their stuff (and they’ll still probably talk to you. Maybe).

- Visit your friends’ boards...and then destroy and steal their goodies and more!
- Watch out - they might plan a revenge attack! Keep your stuff guarded!
- Get board game prizes when invaders land on your game board’s landmarks!

There are board game prizes and more up for grabs - why aren't you playing Board Kings yet? It's the coolest board game online!

comments: This is a fun and addictive game. However, it's really buggy lately. Customer service is a crapshoot. When I got assigned David Jarryd, he only responded every 24 hours, didn't understand English and either only partly solved the problem or not at all. I made purchases that wouldn't include all of the items. Their response on here is to contact them on FB. I tried that, too. No response. I highly recommend that you avoid this game.

I love it but sometimes lose the connection. But still the best game ever. I love the events please keep them coming would love events every day and maybe make available the chance to win more rolls some how as I always run out. Love playing with my friends and family but can we get more prizes and more options to add more friends and be rewarded for having over 30. Play every day and enjoy everytime so thank you developers for creating an exciting wonderful game x

This game was good. Don't bother buying anything from the store as after you do the game doesnt let you land on good tiles ever! My friend and I are on the exact same board is board appears to work fine and actually allow him to make progress. All I get is rubbish. Fix the game you money hungry fake creators

To be very honest, I really love the game and its addictive too. But I don't like when the level and dice counts increases, the time doesnt decreases because of this it makes less interactive to the game. As it seems the real problem what I'm facing till now. I think you must decrease the time because it makes people uninstall more early. I feel like that but I dint want to do that. I love the game. You should think of this problem.

Overall it's a cute game to play whenever. But, I'm constantly get false notification. Like while im playing every few second, saying my dice cap is full or mini games is ending soon. Literally getting these while I'm actively playing. Im always getting kicked out. I have spent more on this game than I should, I feel like you don't get much for what your buying. Even though I have bought packs, I still haven't got my last card of my album. I've been trying to get the last card for over a month.

title: My Story: Choose Your Own Path
description:
🎉 Choose hours of fun with My Story: Choose Your Own Path! 🎉

This interactive storytelling game allows you to make your own decisions and impact the story with your choices. Whether you enjoy drama, romance, comedy or fantasy, in My Story, you are the one that gets to control what happens next. 

Choose a story genre and experience amazing adventures in the world of My Story! Choose a story and let the entertainment begin! Whatever you want to do, you can. 

💄Roleplay as a young fashion icon in Model Undercover and make important decisions for her career; take part in a dating show and find a perfect match in Who Wants to Marry Miss Larson?; or just go for some good old high school drama in our famous story, Love, Mona. 💄

My Story library offers a variety of fun stories! The choice of genre and story is entirely yours, but the fun is guaranteed!

❗Make important decisions and change the narrative. In this fun interactive game, you can choose your own path and change the course of the story. The outcome of future chapters is entirely in your hands. Who will you choose to trust in Mortal Frenemy? How will you handle your magical new life in The Bitten Ones? Do your best to avoid the drama, or choose to confront anyone that stands in your way… 
Why wait a week for the next episode of a TV series when you can find quality entertainment right here? ❗

💕Step up your dating game and control what happens in your love life. Dress up in an outfit that will impress your crush and maybe even get you a date. 
Romance is everywhere in My Story – from high school crushes in Dear Mona to adult relationship drama in Bad Judgement. Go all out and spice up your love life with some seductive lingerie. Choose the most romantic path, create unforgettable moments with your favorite characters, and enjoy your love story!💕

💃Looking for a book series that will give you more fun moments? You will love the Mona series! 
•	Start with Dear Mona – After your first love story finishes mere moments after it started, you are left heartbroken. Few years later, you find yourself falling in love with Shawn, a bad boy with a good heart. However, when your old love returns, you need to make some difficult choices. How will your love story end?
•	After Dear Mona, make your way through the chapters of Love, Mona – Follow Mona’s story from her high school days to adulthood. Navigate through teen crushes, enjoy the college parties, have adventures in Europe and much more. Enjoy the romance, live through the drama, and, in the most difficult moments, help Mona make her decisions. 💃

💌 For more intriguing love stories, check out Forbidden Fruit and The Billionaire’s Darling. 
•	Forbidden Fruit – A night out is just what you needed to get your mind off of college, and that good-looking guy by the bar will make it even better. Too bad he’s your chemistry professor… What will your decision be? Will you choose to pursue a romance with him or will you find another guy to date? How will you handle the drama that comes with dating your college professor? It’s really quite an unconventional love story…
•	The Billionaire’s Darling – A handsome billionaire has his eye on you, a simple college girl? Sounds like every girl’s fantasy. But, when he makes you a strange offer, what path will you choose? And, what will happen when your fake romance starts turning into a real love story? Will you and Henry get through the drama and maintain your love for each other? 💌
 
My Story: Choose Your Own Path is constantly working on producing the most thrilling stories, getting the best authors on board, and creating an unforgettable reading experience for each reader. Our library has a story for every reader. 

Download My Story: Choose Your Own Path, and start shaping your own story!

recentChanges:
My Story has a new update! We added some game improvements as well as other fun new content.
Thank you for downloading and we hope you’ll have fun playing My Story!
comments: Ok...i tried it...it is nice but when i was playing it I felt like something was wrong...then I knew what it was.The everything is too expensive. If we have to make a choice it's like 15 gems but when the chapter is complete we get only 1.I respect that you worked hard on this (maybe because I am 10 years old)but i would appreciate it if you could improve it. Thanks for the game btw.I think it was worth giving 4 stars. Thanks for the game!!!

Stories seem like they could be fun if you had a lot of money to spend on buying diamonds. Every important decision only has one free option. There is only one or MAYBE two free outfits and then all the characters complain. I appreciate the work that went into the game but seriously? And I find every game similar to this one is the same. Honestly, even though I am curious and would like to, I am not even going to finish the first "book".

This would be great if you made it worth our time. Your cost on diamonds for reading a chapter is absurd. Maybe 10 diamonds for every chapter read. Get with the times. I'm sure there are other apps similar that probably are way better. Which I'm going to go find because you can only have the story go one way. Maybe bring down the cost of the outfits. Make it worth our time. This app is a disappointment based on that.

I like this game alot! It is really entertaining to read. I always read the stories at night cause it is better to me! U can pick from criminal, crime, romantic, comedy, and many more sections of books that u want!! There is only one problem to me and that is whenever u download it, it let's u pick ur clothes out, I feel like we shouldnt have to waist our diamonds on the first pick if clothes for what u select. It is my opinion. But besides that, the game is really fun and good!! Hope this help!

I love this game with all my heart it is so fun and interesting, it uplift my moods I really enjoy it as we know the is a but in every story, my only problem is that the story demands more diamonds and in the end of every chapter we get 1 diamond. It takes lots of time to get another ticket, 1 hour is a lot for one ticket of a wonderful story. Lastly the ADs, the story demands more data but some of us cant afford to spend more data in every ADs. Thank you for the wonderful stories

title: OfferUp: Buy. Sell. Letgo. Mobile marketplace
description:
Buy. Sell. Letgo. - OfferUp and Letgo are now one big mobile marketplace.

Buy, sell and shop deals on thousands of unique items nearby! So whether you want to make some extra money by selling your used furniture or want to do some clothes shopping the choice is yours with OfferUp. 

OfferUp makes it easy to find great deals on the things you want and make money on the things you want to sell. Ditch the Classified Ads and garage sales -- this is the best way to buy and sell in your community or neighborhood with a mobile marketplace you can trust.

Cars, clothes, shoes, vintage fashion, and more! Here’s how shopping and selling with OfferUp works:

• Buy or sell anything; easily offer up your items for sale in 30 seconds.
• Find great deals and discounts on clothes, shoes, furniture, vintage fashion, cell phones, electronics, baby & kids items, sports equipment, used cars, home goods and more.
• Use reputation features like ratings and profiles to see who you’re dealing with and build trust.
• Shop local items for sale with thousands of new postings daily.
• Message buyers and sellers securely from within the app.
• Build your reputation with your unique seller profile page.
• Browse and shop items by image and sort by category or location.
• Join millions of people using OfferUp across the country.
• Skip the garage sale! OfferUp is the simplest way to buy and sell locally.

Fun facts about shopping and selling with OfferUp:

1. With OfferUp you can easily sell anything like clothes and shoes, used cars, electronics, vintage fashion, and furniture.
2. OfferUp shows you what’s selling nearby in your local community.
3. Communication between buyers & sellers happens through the app via secure messaging.
4. OfferUp is better than a garage sale; you can do your shopping right on your phone or tablet.

Be part of the community:

We’re making local shopping and selling an experience that everyone can try and trust. The community at the heart of our marketplace is what makes that possible. When you join OfferUp, you’re joining millions of people helping each other make money and save money around the nation -- and right in the neighborhood.

From shoes to cars, vintage fashion to furniture - unearth unique items that you can’t find anywhere else with OfferUp. Download OfferUp today and enjoy the mobile marketplace with plenty of hidden gems just waiting to be discovered.

The two leading mobile marketplaces in the U.S., OfferUp and Letgo, are joining forces to create a new powerhouse. OfferUp acquired Letgo on July 1, 2020.

comments: This app seems to be littered with dozens, if not, hundreds of ads that have been up for, in some cases, over 2 years. I sent one a message asking if it was available, and didn't receive a reply. After seeing that the ad was still posted, I also noticed that it was posted 2 years ago. I saw a few other listings that had the same story. I liked how LetGo didn't leave listings over a couple months old without asking the lister if it was still relevant.

This app is far less usable than Letgo was. The second I click on one thing to see what it is, I am immediately bombarded with listings of similar items from ebay. If I wanted to look on ebay, I would use that app. Don't assume I need to see 20 of that item. Prices aren't listed in the browse page so I have to click to find them. And when something sells, it doesn't disappear. It just stays with the other listings and says "Sold". I dont need to see all the things I cannot buy.

Over 70% of the messages you will get will be fraudulent scams (they are quite obvious, but it's annoying to deal with). There is not much support for when you have issues with the app and I kept getting my posts removed for items being "intangible", which was not true, had photos and descriptions of actual items and there was nothing I could do about it, so it just became pointless and frustrating to use. Stick with FB marketplace or CL or other platforms

Titles, descriptions, and prices of items are not shown in search results, leading me to click a bunch of images only to see that the item is not what I want or out of my price range. PLEASE add titles and prices to search results page. Also the gallery of pictures that are not in any order or in one grid make it confusing to look through listings. I don't get what the intent is... To have me looking through the app forever and never finding what I am looking to buy???? Please fix the UX.

The app already sucked, but now it's worse. Why would you combine 2 apps and not take the good from the other app? To many old listings, nothing expires. Messaging is a joke, you're better off talking to the wall. An speaking of messages, how can I sell something if I dont get notified? To many times I've had to open the app just to see multiple messages, days old, and the buyer long gone, thanks offer up. I remember when this app came out, that was its prime, now it's just garbage.

title: Prison Escape - try the uncharted adventure game
description:
Escape the prison is an adventure game "Room Escape", you are a prisoner under close surveillance, there are guards around you and every exit is blocked by computer systems.
Looking in your cell you will find many objects and tools that may help you, try to use them or combine them.
Codes and passwords are scattered all around, find them and try to use them on computers to unlock bars and doors.
Around you there are other prisoners, try to figure out what they want and if they can help you to solve the puzzles.
If you want to try your hand at an adventure game full of suspense and fun, then try Escape the prison adventure!

summary: Try to escape, help our hero in this uncharted adventure - not a game 4 a granny
recentChanges:
*New Levels!!
*few bugs fixed
comments: Graphics are poor. Not realistic looking people or objects at all. Objects dissapear. Can't get past the second cell level bcuz i cant go back to the cell to see the code on the wall for the safe. There's no help button so don't know what to do next and it just tells you things like "I wouldn't touch that"... not helpful. Cannot adjust the sound and the sound/ voices are of poor quality. I don't know if it's freezing or what but this game is slow especially with no tutorial or help button and you think you've tapped and collected everything already. Just sitting here about to uninstall if I can't figure this out or it doesn't move along a bit.

The original version was pretty good. Got stuck on the blocks for a bit, but the challenge is the whole purpose of the game. Would've rated higher but on the reloaded version, after leaving the cell, I could not move in any direction (not even to go back into the cell) or click on anything. I had already used up all the items I had found too. I'm not sure if it's a bug or if I was supposed to do something else, but it's a little off putting.

I liked it and played half of the game. But especially when I'm in the underground and solved the find the way puzzle and then when I got out, it asked again to play the "find the way" puzzle.. Nearly 7 times I played that game. Its not fair at all. I went even to the next puzzle but when I exit the app and opened again, it asked me to play "find the way".. Frustrating.. I uninstalled now.

Great until the end. Spent ages trying to solve the red green yellow balls. All the walkthroughs I watched, there was a string of 3 balls that only affected each other so easy to solve. Mine did not have this and I do not believe this is solvable. Disappointed
Booo! The puzzles within the game are seemingly pointless, not fun and u have to repeat different versions of the same puzzle u just cracked!

title: AT&T Secure Family™
description:
Peace of Mind Just Got A Lot Easier

As seen on Good Morning America, AT&T Secure Family™ puts parents in control of their children’s phone use.  Find your family, control your child’s screen time and manage their phone use.

Features
*	Locate Family -Track your child on demand or on a regular schedule, for example every day after school
*	Location Alerts - Receive alerts when your child enters or leaves a location, like school or practice. 
*	Location History - Review where your child has been over the previous seven days.
*	Limit Screen Time - Block your child’s mobile data and Wi-Fi, on demand or on a schedule you choose.
*	Content Filters – Block inappropriate Apps and websites by age or customize your own settings.

AT&T Secure Family is free for the first 30 days. After the first 30 days, you will be billed $7.99 each month (includes support for up to 10 lines.)  Service auto renews every 30 days unless cancelled.

AT&T Secure Family Companion App

AT&T Secure Family is designed to work with AT&T Secure Family Companion, a free app in the Google Play Store.  Download it to your child’s phone and pair it with your phone to get all the features.

AT&T Wireless customers – pairing with AT&T Secure Family Companion is recommended to get all the features of Secure Family.  If you do not pair a device, features are limited to AT&T network-based location, scheduled location alerts and location history.
   
AT&T PREPAID wireless customers and customers on other wireless carriers – pairing with AT&T Secure Family Companion on the child device is required to use any of the Secure Family features.
Other important information about AT&T Secure Family:

AT&T Postpaid Wireless customers billed by AT&T:
  -   View, modify or cancel anytime within the app.  
  -   Secure Family and Companion app users must be on the same account.  Only authorized app users have permission to locate a family member.
  -   There is a compatibility conflict that can prevent the addition of AT&T Secure Family Companion to your companion device if you have AT&T Mobile Security Plus running on the same companion device.  If you wish to continue with the purchase, you must either remove AT&T Mobile Security Plus from your account or downgrade to AT&T Mobile Security Basic on the companion device before adding AT&T Secure Family Companion. 
  
AT&T PREPAID wireless customers, and customers of other US Wireless carriers billed by Google Play Store:
  -   After first 30 days, $7.99/mo. will be charged to your Google Play account.  Subscription will automatically renew each month unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current month’s billing period.
  -   To view, modify or cancel your subscription, go to account settings in Google Play Store.  No cancellation of the current month’s subscription is allowed.  No refunds or credits for partial subscription terms. 

General:
  -   Devices running the Secure Family App or Secure Family Companion App require Android v. 5.0 or higher.
  -   Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically reduce battery life.
  -   Availability, timeliness or accuracy of location is not guaranteed. Coverage not available in all areas. The collection, use, and disclosure of any personal information through this application is governed by AT&T's Privacy Policy found at: att.com/privacypolicy. View the AT&T Secure Family website at att.com/securefamily

recentChanges: Release includes bug fixes plus improved pairing between the parent and child phones for those using the App for location tracking only.  A VPN will not be installed for location tracking alone.  VPN will be required for parental controls features such as pause internet or content filtering.  Includes icons on the Map indicating use of cell towers for network location (lower accuracy) or GPS (higher accuracy).  We continue to listen to our valued customers and work to improve your experience.
comments: Quality just keeps going downhill. Seems like bugs get bigger with each update. Lately, when trying to locate another phone on our plan, it can only tell me the county that the phone is in - which is absolutely useless information. Other times, it can't locate the phone at all. AT&T....if you want people to pay for this app, then you need to get it together.

9/25/2020 Has been much more stable. 7/1/2019 I don't get it, I have many apps but this is the only one that regularly has problems. 11/14/2018 What idiot would discontinue an app that was working perfectly fine before the replacement app was ready? Someone at AT&T is really lacking. Update: And the comedy continues! The new replacement app, "Secure Family", is finally here. Location improvements? Can't even locate anyone at all in my family. Now let's see how long it takes AT&T to fix it.

App wont open, keep getting notifications saying the app is updating...been doing this for 3 days..why is it updating for 3 days....not able to use it at all. This type of problem happens all the time, in the past I have had the problem of it opening and then it immediately closes. Even uninstalling and reinstalling does not help. So frustration.

I keep having the app pause and freeze. It states update and freezes. Everytime it updates that happens and it seems to update often like often. I also placed 3 phones on gps and connected their phones for some reason one phone says it is no longer connected since the update and I dont have phone to fix this error but I need this program because the people that have these phones need to be found if they are lost. And I depend on this app to help do that. That's why I have every 1 hr schelduled

This app is terrible. Att Smart Limits was a much better app. Each time I unpause my sons internet access, he has to restart his phone for it allow him internet. Also the GPS is not accurate. His phone was turned on at 9am and at 1pm I get a notification he arrived at school when he had been there all day. You cannot block specific phone numbers like you could in Smart Limits.

title: Detective Story: Jack's Case - Hidden objects
description:
Reveal the mystery of a murder. Investigate the crime using your detective skills. The Detective story is a perfect mix of cinematic storytelling, classic hidden object game and puzzles.

Dip into the mystical adventure where you have to search and find all the clues, solve the puzzles and find a criminal. Let your brain work!

This game is based on real events... 
The story narrates events that occurred in Philadelphia several years ago. One day, an unusual package arrived to the office of your detective agency containing a locked box. Shortly afterwards, you received a strange phone call. The stranger, who called himself "Jack", said that you have just one hour to save a man's life, and gave you a single clue...

But who is Jack, and just what is he after?

About the game: 
🔎 A mind-blowing storyline based on real events. 
Your goal is to solve quests and look for hidden objects, but be careful and don't rush! Some of the quests are tougher than you'd think.

🔎 Detailed HD graphics. 
The game boasts perfectly detailed pictures and textures. All objects look very realistic, and even small details like hidden figures are easily discernible.

🔎 Lots of different locations. 
Explore a huge city and massive number of locations, from backyards to ship decks.

🔎 Over 30 unique characters. 
Get ready to interact with more than 30 characters! Your communication skills will be crucial in cracking this case.

🔎 Tons of case evidence. 
Look for clues and find objects all over the place, even the smallest details matter!

🔎 Fun puzzles and minigames. 
The game is packed with mini games to keep your attention. Find them all!

🔎 Unique collectible cards with information on the criminal underworld. 
Collect all the cards and learn more about the world of real criminal kingpins.

Regular free updates with new cases! The game is a hybrid hidden object, detective story and quest game. Let the investigation begin!
Do you like hunting down hidden objects? What about like solving puzzles and uncovering secrets? Then Detective Story is for you!

Hey everyone, 
We always read and take into account what our players have to say. Please write your suggestions and wishes in the comments section. Best regards, the development team! 

ATTENTION! 
Detective Story: Jack’s Case is a free game with in-game resources available for purchase. If you don't want to make purchases, you can disable this option in Settings. You can also play offline if you don't have an internet connection!

Join our Facebook community:
https://www.facebook.com/detectivestorygame/

comments: During find the diference mode I can't click an object located on the far end either left or right of the screen,i did try to zoom it but it just not working...it still sucks,again it still suckssss
It's a good game but they need to improve with zooming in so you can see the objects better.
I really don't like detective stories but i'm liking this one i think I'll play this one for a long while thanks for lettinge search my mind to finding objects

Superb awesome game.Really one of the best detective game i have ever played.i also recommended it to some of my friends who love to play these type of games. Thanks for developers and game team and others to make such an awesome ,playful game
Good game and all, but some of the objects look nothing like the words.

title: Grand Action Simulator - New York Car Gang
description:
Grand Action Simulator - New York Car Gang is a city simulator in third person view (and FPS mode), where you drive a car or a motorbike. You play is a thug and whole city fears you. The style of city is similar to Miami of Las Vegas but actualy it's New York. Become a chief on the streets of criminality in town. Exciting gameplay: you are waiting for the most hotspots of criminality in Vegas disctrict.

You will fight various star mafia gangsters from America, Russia, China, Mexico, Japan etc. The game contains fully Open world Environment. Explore the big city, go off-roading in the mountains, steal and drive supercars, shoot guns and more in this free open world game! You can also buy a lot of things in a shop to help you complete missions and release the city from all mafia sinners. Most of the missions will be on streets, some will be in chinatown district and other gang lands etc

Are your ready for great criminal theft adventure? Be ready to rob, kill, shoot and fight!  Stealing auto cars, evading cops, racing through streets, and shooting down other gangs… Do you have enough guts to rise to the top of the criminal piles? Try out all the supercars and bikes. Make stunts on a bmx or find an ultimate F-90 tank or devastating battle helicopter.

Let it be as a beautiful city, do not turn into crime city with blood and robbery. Good old story about a car thief in a dangerous town, looking for some easy money. Dominate the city with a devastating firepower of advanced military vehicles or upgrade your hero to knock down enemies in a few kicks!



• Visually stunning graphics, character and army vehicle models, Helicopter, Air fighter, etc.
• HD quality graphics
• Guns to buy and shoot
• Off road terrains to explore

comments: This game, Grand Action Simulator is actually very good and enjoyable to me. I had played this game before. There is problem with this game, it get hanged while playing. If they can fix this problem and if they add more places, weapons and cars. I will give 3 stars. Thank you.

I love this game very much. But I need a game where there is more than 20 countries. There will 1 airport on each country. I will buy ticket to travel from One country to another country. (Suppose that I will go from Japan to USA then I will need to buy ticket, like $1100). There will minimum 3/4 railway stations on each country. I will buy ticket to travel from One area to another area . (Suppose that I will go from New York to another one then I will need to buy ticket, like $110)

I liked this game so much but i want new job places like a bank,a post office, a office,a police station,etc.And why is not there any fire department,bus station,etc from where we can take the job.We shouldn't be able to take parked vehicles without its keys. There should more of job like buildings which we can go inside to take keys of the vehicle(for rent) parked for the job.After any job is done we should only be able to get money by collecting it from its departmentbyparking itsvehicle back
I rate five stars not because it's a generally good game, but because it's very janky and it's just perfect. But add more houses, a larger open world, and melee weapons. Thanks!
I agree I would like to see more buildings, houses, and countries but overall I enjoy this game.

title: Farm Frenzy Free: Time management games offline 🌻
description:
Farm Frenzy has 72 action-packed levels to keep you busy, starting from simple chicken egg collecting tasks to the rigours of producing cheese, woollen cloth and cakes all at the same time. 

Best of all farming games Farm Frenzy is now free!

In the style of management games you, like a real farmer, will have to work hard to achieve your goals, whether that’s owning a certain number of animals, buy and sell chickens, producing a specific number of goods or simply racking up a huge profit in your farmland. This is a farming simulator - time management games full free.

Have you ever wondered what it would be like to run your own fully working farm?  Now you are a farmer! Looking after chickens, sheep and cows, producing cakes, wool, butter and cheese. If you fancy giving it a go without having to get up at the crack of dawn every day Farm Frenzy - the farming games for you!  

To help you along the way you can upgrade various parts of your village, from the vehicle you use to transport the goods to market, to the warehouse you can store goods in, even the buildings that produce the goods. Soon you’ll be a big farmer producing vast quantities of products and turning over a huge profit in farm games.

As well as the standard upgrades the really canny player may unlock special VIP bonuses, these include super-fast transport vehicles for your village, automatic water-pumps and discount cards to secure cheaper purchasing of animals for your farmland!

With bright vibrant graphics, a great soundtrack and more fun than an afternoon at the petting zoo, farmland will have you hooked. 

Game features:

• 72 original levels in farming games
• Funny animals to care for!
• Lots of ferma products to sell 
• Over 30 buildings' upgrades for the village
• Unlimited farm games time
• VIP bonuses
• time management games
_____________________________________

If you wish to play Farm Frenzy without any ads, just check out this special premium version of the game here:

descriptionHTML:
Farm Frenzy has 72 action-packed levels to keep you busy, starting from simple chicken egg collecting tasks to the rigours of producing cheese, woollen cloth and cakes all at the same time.

Best of all farming games Farm Frenzy is now free!

In the style of management games you, like a real farmer, will have to work hard to achieve your goals, whether that’s owning a certain number of animals, buy and sell chickens, producing a specific number of goods or simply racking up a huge profit in your farmland. This is a farming simulator - time management games full free.

Have you ever wondered what it would be like to run your own fully working farm? Now you are a farmer! Looking after chickens, sheep and cows, producing cakes, wool, butter and cheese. If you fancy giving it a go without having to get up at the crack of dawn every day Farm Frenzy - the farming games for you!

To help you along the way you can upgrade various parts of your village, from the vehicle you use to transport the goods to market, to the warehouse you can store goods in, even the buildings that produce the goods. Soon you’ll be a big farmer producing vast quantities of products and turning over a huge profit in farm games.

As well as the standard upgrades the really canny player may unlock special VIP bonuses, these include super-fast transport vehicles for your village, automatic water-pumps and discount cards to secure cheaper purchasing of animals for your farmland!

With bright vibrant graphics, a great soundtrack and more fun than an afternoon at the petting zoo, farmland will have you hooked.

Game features:

• 72 original levels in farming games
• Funny animals to care for!
• Lots of ferma products to sell
• Over 30 buildings' upgrades for the village
• Unlimited farm games time
• VIP bonuses
• time management games
_____________________________________

If you wish to play Farm Frenzy without any ads, just check out this special premium version of the game here:
Farm Frenzy on Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.herocraft.game.farmfrenzy

To find more farm games -

Happy farming, and thank you for playing. 👍
comments: I honestly can't hate this one to be honest, the original was a staple of my earlier years. But its just so damn clunky, the starter animals are ducks instead of chickens for some reason, its pretty poorly optimization considering most of the visuals have been compressed and downgraded for mobile devices. The freezings pretty annoying too. TLDR, Good game mediocre port

First I'm play this in pc! And than I found this game on my page is this official? And yes! I'm found one from ten my favorite game on pc on phone! Now I can play with free! No ads! And more level. I'm play this game since I'm in primary school by the way
I was also low on money around the time I installed it lol! Its not a bad priced, and I do occasionally purchase from other games.
Fun game. Best part is NO ADS! That makes it the best game I've played in a very long time!
Best game ever the best part is there is no ads

title: Smart Recorder – High-quality voice recorder
description:
Free and easy to use audio recorder for Android. It has been specifically designed for high-quality and long-time recording with a clean and simple user interface.

With a skipping silence on-the-fly feature you can shorten recordings by omitting relative silence. It allows you, for example, to catch night sleep talks or maybe some snoring, whatever comes first. 😴 It is by the way how the idea to make this app was born: my wife wanted to prove that I talk at night. It turns out, I do. 🤔

Since 2012 this app has been installed on more than 40 million devices worldwide and proven to be a reliable everyday tool. From it's early days it has been known as Smart Voice Recorder, rebranded later to a bit more generic name. Because, you know, it's great not only for voice. 🎸

Regarding phone calls: 📲
This app is not designed explicitly for recording phone calls. Some manufacturers block the ability to record the other party of a phone call for privacy or legal reasons. For the same purpose, the app will even pause the recording during phone calls, but it can be turned off in the settings. Check your local laws and make sure it works on your handset first.

More features:
•  Automatic and manual sensitivity control for Skip silence mode (Beta)
•  Live audio spectrum analyzer
•  Wave/PCM encoding with adjustable sample rate (8-44 kHz)
•  Recording in the background (even when a display is off)
•  Save/pause/resume/cancel recording process control
•  Efficient and easy on battery
•  Recording time limited only by available space on your storage (and tech. limit 2GB per file)
•  Straightforward recordings list and many sharing options
•  Launcher shortcut to start recording in one tap
•  Microphone gain calibration tool.
