developerAddress: 23 Musgrave Road, Red Hill, Queensland 4059, Australia
recentChanges:
Halloween is here - Happy Hauntings! Barry has ventured quite a way from the usual locations and discovered some forlorn woods. Hallows Hell is beckoning you into its misty depths to harvest its rewards.

- Added New Weapon - Crossbow!
- Added New Costumes:
- Viking
- Undead Slayer
- Infiltrator
- Vlad Stakefries
- New Double Jump Ability
- New Super Slam Ability
- Updated Cliffs to not cause Instant Death
- Improved Tutorial for new players
- Misc Bug Fixes and Improvements
comments: I really like this game. I will still play it. But I really dislike the new art style. It feels cheaper in my opinion. I have not heard the sound design yet (been playing with volume off) but I hope its the same as before. That is my real only complaint. If you could revert back I would very much enjoy that. just the art design and animations that is. Everthing else is fine. In short, it feels like a downgrade not a revamp or an upgrade. But this is just MY opinion after all.

It's really great to see the miraculous return of Monster Dash again after a decade or so. (The hype is real.) It's a pretty quick paced game that gets straight to the point, and it's also fun at the same time. So overall, it's a pretty noice game! (This is actually the first time I've ever said this much while rating a game. I guess I'm pretty proud of actually have enough courage to accomplish writing this whole text. Woo.)

I really love this game!! So much fun to play. This is the best game, in my opinion, that you guys have made besides Jetpack Joyride! You gotta love Barry Steakfries!! Keep up the great work developers!! I look forward to seeing all the great updates you have in store for the future! This is a definite 5 stars all the way!

Ok I for one would like to say Love, Love, Love this game. I played it a long time ago, I was a bit shocked and happy to see that after all this time ITS BACK! It reminds me of all the great time I played it back then. I have one problem tho. The speed of the game picks up too quickly. I get that you guys want to make the game a bit more challenging the time period is too short can you guys do something about that?! Would you guys consider maybe adding in some boss fights, could be a great Idea!

Controls are slow one moment and fast the other this makes the game unenjoyable. Also I've noticed that all of you at halfbrick have said it's "back from the dead". But it feels more like it's back and buried for good. The only real new thing is the expensive costumes and the update in graphics. Please add new weapons that are useful and affordable. Also I believe a change of colour to the spikes on the yeti area because they're hard too see.

title: Soap Cutting - Satisfying ASMR
description:
The most satisfying ASMR soap cutting game for antistress. You've seen it in the videos and now you get to slice, cut, and shred some amazing soaps yourself while listening to relaxing sounds and getting a tingling ASMR sensation.

Besides the relaxing sounds and ASMR effect, there’s nothing more satisfying than getting to slice and shred soap when you’re feeling stressed, making Soap Cutting the #1 antistress game of the year.
The ultimate satisfaction that comes from slicing and shredding all the different types of soap is unlike anything else! If you’ve never experienced ASMR or soap cutting, just wait - this game is the best antistress tool you could find. So what are you waiting for? Start slicing!
 
 
Game Features:
- Realistic soap cutting
- Many different types of soaps. You will recognise them.
- Carve the soap
- Relaxing sounds
 
Play now and start cutting!

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app

comments: I absolutly luv this game! It is super satisfying. You get new knife's to cut with, and you find super cool objects inside each soap that you cut. It's so calming! :3 However, one thing i dont like is that if you want to open your "mystery gift" you have to watch an ad. I dunno! maybe thats just my device but otherwise this is such an amazing game! Keep up the great work! :D

Pretty good game after all, but you need minimize the advertising. That's really annoying after each game, there's an ad. And please get rid of the vibrating... This game is played for satisfaction but it clearly annoys me on how much ads and vibrating is. When you are cutting, my phone starts vibrating and it's really unsatisfactory. Kindly make changes..

I LOVE this game, it is so satisfying and fun to do!!! The only thing that I don't really like about the game is just that there is an add after every single round, but then again I don't mind because the adds will give me something to look forward to (the satisfaction) but I would definitely recommend this game 👍♥️👍♥️

I love this app, its relaxing and because its offline it can work when you are bored without wifi unlike some games. It's a good app and you should get it because it lives up to expectations, plus you can unlock more soap knives in different styles and colours. Also if you dont have a lot of soap, dont want to ruin it, but you want the same satisfying feeling as other vids well this game is totally for you.

I love this app! It makes a very unsatisfying noise once you are done with a level.And all of the soaps make the same sound when you cut them.But all of the good things about this app make the bad things seem very tiny.I love how satisfying this is!I wish i could soap cut in real life but my parents don't let me.I love all of the different knife types!They are very awesome.I would play this all day!Thank you CrazyGames,I hope you keep making amazing games!Plus, your ASMR slicing game is awesome!

title: Criminal Case
description:
Criminal Case - the #1 free hidden object game! Are you ready to solve murder cases?
Download now and discover who killed Rosa Wolf...

Join the Police of Grimsborough to solve a series of murder cases in this captivating hidden object, adventure game. Investigate crime scenes for clues, bring the suspects in for questioning and analyze evidence to catch the killers. Are you ready to prove your detective skills?

FEATURES:
• Investigate crime scenes in a grim and corrupt city
• Play with your friends to be the best detective ever
• Examine clues and analyze samples to look for evidence
• Interrogate witnesses and suspects
• Bring the killer to justice

PLEASE NOTE – Criminal Case is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Under our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years old to play or download Criminal Case.

Terms of Use: http://www.prettysimplegames.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: http://www.prettysimplegames.com/privacy-policy

comments: Sorry folks,got to down grade my review. First: New players don't fall into the Facebook trap it's more trouble than it's worth. Second: I agree with other players in regards to the time it takes to get results back from tests, and to many ads. If you're that hard up for $ make the sponcers pay not the players. Third: come on guys, make this more player friendly and more people will play. That's a no brainer

I love this game! I've been playing it for many years. What I don't understand is why it says I have to download a separate app (for Travel in Time) when, in the past, it's let me use just the 1 app for all the chapters (Pacific Bay, Save the World, Mysteries of the Past & the Conspiracy). I would rather be able to use the same app like I have been this whole time than have to not only download another app but not have all of my XP, stars, energy & money not be carried over

They are now putting ads in between plays. Never had them before. Nevertheless love playing CC. I broke down and bought the ad removable app. It works but when I go to send out anything I get..Invalid access_ code when trying to do it. I have contacted Facebook and Criminal Case. They are telling me that I need to contact Google play cause that was the card I purchased the ad remover using. Google play is to fix the problem. So google play.....fix it! Been 3 weeks.

I love this game and the only reason it isn't getting five stars is because recently, the videos to recieve extra time and daily rewards will not play. If this glitch can be fixed, I will gladly change my review. Thanks. This problem still occurs. So I have changed my review to two stars. I will change it to five if and when it is fixed. It is a true disappointment in an otherwise great game.

Was running fine & progressing nicely until it tried to force me to accept a Facebook policy, I cannot accept the cookies as screen won't drag to press accept as screen size has changed, so it means I'm no longer able to send help/ items to friends or ask for help with reports at the end of each case, also feeding pets has changed to adverts only which now takes forever....really disappointed & frustrated so please change it back to 5 min timers & cut the excessive adverts for everything

title: Tripadvisor Hotel, Flight & Restaurant Bookings
description:
Plan your vacation and book an amazing trip, with millions of travel recommendations and reviews from travelers like you on hotels, must-do experiences, top places to eat and other nearby vacation hidden gems. Tripadvisor is the perfect travel planner, helping you book a table at restaurants and compare low prices when booking hotels and flights for your next trip.

The Tripadvisor app is the ultimate travel planner, and is free and easy to use:

• Access over 830 million reviews of hotels, flights, things to do, vacation rentals, and restaurants from travelers like you
• Use our planning tool, Trips, to save and organize your travel ideas for hotels, restaurants, tours and attractions and see them together on a map
• Find great deals on hotels by comparing the lowest prices from more than 200 booking sites worldwide
• Search and book the world’s largest collection of tours, attractions and experiences
• Modify or cancel most tour, attraction and experience bookings for free
• Access mobile tickets for booked tours and activities
• Use Google Pay or PayPal to make tour or activity bookings
• Find great food wherever you are and reserve tables at local restaurants
• Compare airfares and find great deals on flights
• Browse and book Travelers’ Choice award-winning hotels, experiences, restaurants and more
• Get answers on specific questions from other like-minded travelers in the Tripadvisor forums
• Add your own reviews and photos of places you’ve visited
• Quickly discover nearby hidden gem travel recommendations, find and book must-see things to do while on your trip as well as reserve tables at great restaurants
• View traveler and local recommended places on a map while on your trip

While on a trip, use the app to view nearby hidden gems, hotels, restaurants and top vacation tours and attractions on a map -- then save ideas for later, or book your favorites on the spot and visit a city later. The Tripadvisor travel planner app uses your location to send you great travel recommendations and we  share this information with trusted third party partners to provide you with a better experience. Note that your location is collected even if the app is in the background.
descriptionHTML:
Plan your vacation and book an amazing trip, with millions of travel recommendations and reviews from travelers like you on hotels, must-do experiences, top places to eat and other nearby vacation hidden gems. Tripadvisor is the perfect travel planner, helping you book a table at restaurants and compare low prices when booking hotels and flights for your next trip.

The Tripadvisor app is the ultimate travel planner, and is free and easy to use:

• Access over 830 million reviews of hotels, flights, things to do, vacation rentals, and restaurants from travelers like you
• Use our planning tool, Trips, to save and organize your travel ideas for hotels, restaurants, tours and attractions and see them together on a map
• Find great deals on hotels by comparing the lowest prices from more than 200 booking sites worldwide
• Search and book the world’s largest collection of tours, attractions and experiences
• Modify or cancel most tour, attraction and experience bookings for free
• Access mobile tickets for booked tours and activities
• Use Google Pay or PayPal to make tour or activity bookings
• Find great food wherever you are and reserve tables at local restaurants
• Compare airfares and find great deals on flights
• Browse and book Travelers’ Choice award-winning hotels, experiences, restaurants and more
• Get answers on specific questions from other like-minded travelers in the Tripadvisor forums
• Add your own reviews and photos of places you’ve visited
• Quickly discover nearby hidden gem travel recommendations, find and book must-see things to do while on your trip as well as reserve tables at great restaurants
• View traveler and local recommended places on a map while on your trip

While on a trip, use the app to view nearby hidden gems, hotels, restaurants and top vacation tours and attractions on a map -- then save ideas for later, or book your favorites on the spot and visit a city later. The Tripadvisor travel planner app uses your location to send you great travel recommendations and we share this information with trusted third party partners to provide you with a better experience. Note that your location is collected even if the app is in the background.
summary: Browse traveler photos for inspiration and map out your own travel plans.
recentChanges:
We frequently update the Tripadvisor app to make it even more useful to travelers like you. Here’s what’s new:

• Various performance improvements and bug fixes to help you find great places nearby, wherever you are
comments: The 'Go to App' when away from home. I like to read several reviews on anywhere I may visit. Gain a picture of what to expect & look for possible pointers for what to try, see or sample. We are all different & "one man's meat is another man's position." Any venue can have an, "off day" ditto waiter, receptionist, chiefs, etc. It's an 'over view' I seek, a feel for a place. NB: don't just read reviews of places - but also reviewers reviews! Be aware of 'planted' (paid) reviews & reviewers.

Good with booking a hotel, bad for booking a flight on Tripadvisor. The reason being is that I look on a different booking site for flight prices, compared this to expedia and expedia is the best bet for booking a flight as their prices make sense to me. Step up your A-game in the case of booking a flight Tripadvisor please!

The best app for finding your way around a new place. It has all the restaurants and is almost always reliable, and is very useful for finding other things like attractions too. I wish it would remember more things when you switched off the app (ie switching to WhatsApp and then back) as its a pain to have to find the page you were just on, but it's still really a great app.

You ruined the app. It used to be my go to app for restaurants and hotels, now it can't even find a location less than 1km from me. Not only that, when I did pull it from the map (which is also wrong) it said it was closed. What a joke. Don't expect me to use this app anymore.
Frustrating at times, asks if you want to limit your results to the specific area you search for, but even when you do that, it still includes loads of suggestions that are further away....

title: Maps for Minecraft PE

Installing a map is as easy as clicking "Download" and then "Play" — the game will open automatically with your new map installed & ready to play!


Each map has a brief description, screenshot, credits and other information! 

You will find all kinds of worlds: from houses and huge cities to PvP battle mini-games and adventures, hide and seek, one block and so much more!


MineMaps offers the best maps for you to enjoy and share the fun with your friends!

title: Google Voice
description:
Google Voice gives you a phone number for calling, text messaging, and voicemail. It works on smartphones and computers, and syncs across your devices so you can use the app in the office, at home, or on the go.

NOTE: Google Voice only works for personal Google Accounts in the US and G Suite accounts in select markets. Text messaging is not supported in all markets.

  You're in control
  Get spam filtered automatically and block numbers you don’t want to hear from. Manage your time with personalized settings for forwarding calls, text messages, and voicemail.

  Backed up and searchable
  Calls, text messages, and voicemails are stored and backed up to make it easy for you to search your history.

  Manage messages across devices
  Send and receive individual and group SMS messages from all your devices.

  Your voicemail, transcribed
  Google Voice provides advanced voicemail transcriptions that you can read in the app and/or have sent to your email.

  Save on international calling
  Make international calls at competitive rates without paying extra for international minutes with your mobile carrier.

  Keep in mind:
  • Google Voice is currently only available in the US. Google Voice for G Suite users is available in select countries. Check with your administrator for access.
  • Calls made using Google Voice for Android can be placed through a Google Voice access number. All access number based calls use the standard minutes from your cell phone plan and may incur costs (e.g. when traveling internationally).

recentChanges: • Stability and performance improvements.
comments: Google Voice no longer works with the latest, official messaging app. Google is forcing us to use the Carrier Number, now. So, this app is no longer properly integrated with the Google ecosystem as it exists in 2020. It's so disappointing that I have to port my decade-old number BACK to the carrier just to use the latest default messaging app. What a mess, so frustrating, but I guess not the worst thing to happen in 2020 :/

I love Google Voice! When COVID-19 closed the schools I was able to keep in touch with my students and their parents without giving away my personal mobile number. I can call and send/receive texts on my phone and my computer. The best part is that I can copy text messages in their entirety and paste them directly into my Parent Contact Log. Indispensable!

Ive been with Gmail and Voice since they were in beta and invitation only. All they've done is improve over time. Always great call quality and its allowed me to always have the same number without caring about delays around porting my number when I've changed my carrier. Its the only number I give out. I never get spam or fraudulent calls. I suppose it's because of all that Google AI special sauce. Keep up the good work!

Works great on my primary mobile device, but will not receive calls on my spare phone. This appears to be a product defect, which limits GV's portability. Looking forward to a fix, which would earn it a full 5-Star rating from me. Update: Developer contacted me and it appears that I missed a key step. My bad. GV now rings through to both my primary, and spare phone. Upgrading to 4 stars. My secondary phone, LG Rebel 4, will vibrate only.

When people call, it goes straight to voice-mail. Even tho I have answered the call. They are leaving a message and I can here them and they can hear me and we both can hear the voice-mail recording but can't stop it. And 3 times I have been in the middle of a conversation with someone and it switches to a completely random person that I didn't call...and the person i did call can still hear our conversation (me and the new person) but we cant hear them. I will never use this service again.

title: FemPal
description: This company, FemPals, was founded by Edward and Audrey Im in 2018. It all sparked with a sudden occurrence at a nearby pharmacy in San Francisco in which a homeless mother was seeking donations both monetary and physical. We asked her if there was anything we could do but instead of asking for food or water, she answered with tampons. Consequently, we had a revelation that feminine products are overlooked in the volunteer and donor community. As a result, homeless women are unable to afford the products they need and are unable to receive them when most necessary. To combat this issue, we wanted to give dignity to homeless women, empower them, and help them when they need it most by creating FemPals. Using FemPals, the user is able to donate to those both in an urban and rural setting. This therefore increases the amount of pads, tampons, etc. able to reach the impoverished or homeless.

title: Flipboard - Latest News, Top Stories & Lifestyle
description:
Discover quality content for all your interests - from personalized news, entertainment, tech and sports articles to trending lifestyle magazines. We'll deliver the latest headlines, events, and entertainment stories to save you time, keep you informed and make sure you're always up-to-date with what's happening.

NEW: Flipboard TV - watch video from hundreds of publishers, TV stations and independent producers for free. Visit the Explore tab to select from 20 curated video channels for news, politics, travel, lifestyle, celebrity, sports and more.

Trust our unique combination of professional editors and smart algorithms to customize and deliver must-read stories and undiscovered gems. Get the full perspective on the latest news - and share what you find. Our editors blend expert voices and curated sources, and even recommended stories they know you'll like, so you can sit back and flip through what matters most to you. 

You can even customize your personalized newsstand: pick your passions and create a Smart Magazine for each topic feed. Are you interested in world news, events or tech developments? Want to read articles from national newspapers, discover sports podcasts, and skim the latest news? Looking to seize the zeitgeist from trending lifestyle stories? Flipboard has you covered. 

Plus, you can create personal magazines: find articles you want to read later or you want to share, and use the "+" to flip them into your own magazines. 

MAKE THE BEST USE OF YOUR TIME ON FLIPBOARD:

• Discover the latest news from The New York Times, National Geographic, Vanity Fair, and thousands more top newspapers and magazines, local, national or from around the world

• Create and customize your Smart Magazines: bundle together sources, people and even hashtags to get access to truly personalized news

• Customize your home feed: collate up to 9 of your favorite Smart Magazines together for quick access to the features you love

• Read The Daily Edition: keep up with the latest headlines and trending events in our daily roundup of important stories and personalized news articles

• Curate your perspective: collect stories around specific themes and add them to personal magazines

TOP PUBLISHERS ON FLIPBOARD:

- News & Politics: discover the latest headlines in national and world news, with newspapers and publications like The New York Times, CNN, Politico, Axios
- Tech & Science: read the latest tech news with TechCrunch, trending science stories with Wired, and more
- Business & Entrepreneurship: get personalized news relevant to your interests from The Wall Street Journal, Bloomberg, Forbes
- Sports: national pastimes or world news, never miss key sporting events with ESPN, CBS Sports
- Entertainment: get world news, even for celebrities and entertainment with People, Rolling Stone, Variety
- Lifestyle & Wellness: explore emerging lifestyle trends with Brit + Co., Self, Women's Health
- Food & Cooking: get some serious food inspiration from Bon Appetit, Food & Wine, Serious Eats
- Travel: feed your wanderlust with National Geographic, Travel + Leisure, Lonely Planet
- Home & Gardening: dream up your ideal home ELLE DECOR, House Beautiful
- Style: avant-garde or corporate with an edge... get sartorial inspiration from Vogue, Refinery29, W Magazine, GQ

KEEP UP WITH FLIPBOARD:

For product updates and the latest headlines from our blog, including tips on how to use Flipboard and interviews with actors, writers, musicians, and more. Follow us on:
www.twitter.com/@flipboard
www.facebook.com/Flipboard
https://www.linkedin.com/company/flipboard-inc-

For videos on how to use Flipboard, visit https://about.flipboard.com/tutorials/

Need help using the Flipboard app? Browse our help articles by opening Settings then Help & Feedback. Or, click the contact button at flip.it/help

comments: Nice interface. Though each type of device has a different user experience, (iOS, Android, MacOS), a little weird but each is still very good. I like the ability to add and subtract areas if interest. They mark ads/sponsored posts pretty well. Pretty speedy on all devices, even somewhat older ones. Overall a nice news agragator.

I've been using flipboard for years. Now like 80% of the content is videos. And NONE of those videos actually play. It's so weird. They have some new video set up, every time I click on a video, it doesn't play. Just black screen. Click on it, it goes to another black screen. So, two major problems rendering this app useless: 1. Nearly all news is now in the form of videos. I don't want videos. I want to read, and 2. Those videos don't even work. How do you not beta test this, Flipboard??

If I open a page on source like golf or mma or something like that, I get articles that cover something else entirely. I'm really annoyed that I spend more time reporting articles that are not on topic and I don't know why this hasn't changed in years of reporting these articles... Please do something about this.

Been using flipboard for quite some time since you can customize what news you see or just flip through all news. Biggest down side is tbe comment section is really subpar and broken up into different sections. Dont even bother commenting if you see 100 plus comments because your comment is lost at the bottom. Other than that is a nice app to see any news you want.

Can't share URL if you click a link inside an article. Steps to repro: 1. Tap into an article 2. Tap any link on the page that goes to a different site 3. Observe the top toolbar shrinks from several items to 2 items. 4. Tap the share button in that toolbar 5. Pick literally anything on share sheet. 6. See "Couldn't Share item" error every time. If you fix this bug lmk and I'll revise my review! Update: Flipboard denied this obvious, reproducible bug. Smh. Bug does not happen on ios.

comments: Completely unusable app, none of the pages load, I can't change anything about my account, I can't even view anything about my account, it has been this way for at least 3 years and across three different phones so it's not just an issue with my phone or something temporary. I'm not sure how this app got any five-star reviews not going to lie. if anyone is able to use this app and it's helpful to them in any way, I would love to know your secret.

This app is sooo buggy and nothing has changed for the 3 years I've been a customer! Can't update any profile information ever, it's so annoying. One way or another something is going to glitch out and you won't be able to finish your task or it won't recognize it or won't load the page or whatever. Wish I could just delete it off my phone...

I am satisfied with my service there are no hidden fees or added charges each month. My bill is consistent and that is what I wanted, other networks raised my monthly bill without communicating with me and it caused a financial hardship for me. The T- mobile app is user friendly and easy to navigate. I am very happy with my T-Mobile network service and I would recommend T-Mobile to my friends and family over any other network out on the market today.

I love the T-Mobile app. When I put my new SIM card in my phone, it was not activated yet and I could not make phone calls, but I was able to use the T-Mobile app to live chat with a representative who activated my SIM card for me. Thanks T-mobile! There are also many other things that you can do using the app including lots of information about your account.

Any other app would get 3-4 stars, but T-Mpbil4 has excellent standards and Ledger exclusive customer experiences across almost the entire board except with this app. In one word, this app is CLUNKY. Processes move slow, 2-step verification can close the app out, any smoothness you have is totally lost w/ pop up or split screen and navigation feels like traversing the wreckage of a 4-app collision. Note 10+ 5G this is not hardware issue. 1 star only to bring it to yalls attentjon

title: Run Sausage Run!
description:
Run, Sausage, run!
Hot diggity dog, that’s a fine lookin’ hot dog! 
You never sausage a sausage! (Get it? Saw such… sausage? Anyone?)

Stop punning and start running! This adventure run is a hot dog’s dream - or nightmare - depending on how well you do.

Play as the tasty sausage of your choice. Weisswurst or blutwurst, bacon or chocolate… even plumber or cowboy!

Run for your life through an endless path as you flex that hot-dog body and avoid getting sliced, chopped, burned or smashed in this adventure run game! 

Tons of juicy sausages to choose from, tons of hot dog skins to enjoy in this adventure run. 

Collect coins as you run for your sweet (or spicy) life to buy buns of steel and other cool powerups in this adventure run game.

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app

comments: Great game when you are out you need no internet a little hard at first but you'll get used to it when I am sat next to my friend we always race very fun to do when you're bored and have nothing to do
Best game I ever played it is not lagging you dont need ads to buy and equip anything and it is so easy I love it so much no words can describe how much I love this game

This is the worst game ive ever played. I dont recommend this game to anyone. This took me 4 hours to download litteraly 1 percent every 2 minutes, then i get the worst possible experience of my life. Also, ads every single level and usually i instantly die because theres 6 wheel spikes at the very beginning not timed right to be possible. I dont care what you do to this game, im never playing it again.
This game is so fun. I play it alot this game does have a few ads which is annoying but i still like the game
Too Hard, and way to many ads.

comments: I love this editor, it's easy to use, doesn't crash like others I have tried. The 4 instead of 5 stars is simply because of the time it takes to process the final video. Other apps for a 5 minute video takes around 5-7 minutes, this one took 30 minutes, which to me is far too long. Especially when some of my videos will be at least 15 minutes long. I'm dreading the wait on those ones.

Awesome easy to use video editor! Many great features. I accessed and edited right from the videos on my Android phone! Others I tried were awkward and not as many simple to use features. Try it out and 0lay around with the music and effects , just to name two out of dozens. You'll love it! No, I don't work for the developer! Lol😁

This is great app. No watermarks and excellent editing software capabilities. Easily rivals computer editing software. My only problem is there's no backspace or Ctrl+Z (however you wanna say it) so if you make a mistake, you can't undo it. Please add one and this will be my new favourite editing app. It's also user friendly! :D highly recommend

I've used it once so far but it is very handy. It has variety of music and I read the option to even put your own. It allows you to add to your photos as text, transitions, music, and many other things!! What I had used was ALL FREE. Definitely recommend. There are adds but eh everything has ads now-a-days

It's actually nice and user friendly specially for the ones who aren't that 'techy' . However, there was one problem that I faced which was that when you try to add any media at the starting of the video once it has been made, the whole audio that is attached to the previous media moves in front and leading to all the audios to move ahead. When you try to push the audio back it actually kind of gets trimmed.

title: Forge of Empires: Build your city
description:
Forge of Empires - Build a city!

Build an empire & travel through the ages! From ancient civilizations, through medieval kingdoms, and all the way to the future. Rise and rule your lands with pride!

Forge of Empires was originally released in 2012, becoming an award-winning strategy city-building browser game. This RTS MMO sim is live for 9 years now and is full of amazing content with a huge active player base from all over the world!

Features:

- Build your city, rule your empire and experience history! All while travelling through the eras of mankind.

 - Evolve your village into a town and then forge it into a megapolis!

- Be smart and efficient in building houses & producing resources. Make the best of your land!

- Find your own building style! Choose from hundreds of different houses and castles!

- Like to compete? Win tactical pvp battles in the multiplayer mode and conquer their realms!

- Not in a mood to fight? Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors!

- Discover new territories & develop new technologies!

- Enjoy real life events (Christmas, Easter, Halloween and many more) and win amazing rewards and prizes!

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

General Terms and Conditions: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/agb
Imprint:	https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint

recentChanges:
Our spooktacular Halloween Event will continue running until November 4th!
- Earn tickets by completing quests in our brand new event.
- Use them to buy tools to clear a path in the foggy fairground.
- Uncover scary toys, rewarding pumpkins and coveted lightbulbs.
- Collect enough lightbulbs to win our terrifying grand prize: The House of Horrors!
Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!
comments: You'll hear this a lot. Game is a marathon, not a sprint. If you are ready to spend time to build your own little city you can do it without any diamonds, premium currency. Community is really helpful and good guild can make all the difference for one to stick with the game. It can be played on both mobile and browser, which is great because as city grows more time is needed to get it to run optimally.

Unbalanced game play, players with much a bought stronger army can attack and plunder your items, super slow game play unless you're a pay player, I've been stuck for sometimes a week or more trying gain or trade for items to advance research, like I stated before if you throw real money at the game you can buy your way to the top a thousand times faster.

Great game! If you're looking to "beat" a game, this isn't it. It's a slow roll, even slower if you don't purchase diamonds. The game play is good, and even at a slow pace, I'm entertained. I do have a suggestion though.. I'd like to be able to sell my buildings to other users, especially in my guild. If I could get forge points, goods, etc instead of auction $, the game would be even more interesting.

Great game. However, a couple of suggestions 1. Please add a currently online/offline feature for players to see. Doesnt have to be seen by everyone, maybe just by friends and guild mates. 2. Please add in a last online feature for friends and guild mates to see. It is very hard to manage friends and guild list when you have no idea who are active and inactive players. 3. I find this game compared to most hardly gives out the in game currency(diamonds). Maybe try handing slightly more to players

The game is so bugged I can't even start playing it right, but also I have it's a pay to play game . I've put my 10$ in this game to see if it's worth it, but honestly didn't even reach the point where I use them cause game won't load event or story and so on.... In short- no.

title: Car Simulator 2
description:
Play the most realistic driving simulator of 2020! (version 1.33.12)
A new open world, over 35 new cars, and amazing gameplay await you!
  
Play online with real players from all over the world, win, and earn currency you can spend on new cars, upgrades, garages, and a house. 
  
Cruise all over the city with your friends, upgrade your cars, enter and win insane races, explore a large city, and become the best! 
 
Race by your own rules! Let's go!

Features:
- A fun, free-to-play game that's a blast to play.
- Online and single-player modes.
- 3D open world.
- Daily bonuses and quests.
- Fully detailed car models.
- Drive from a first- or third-person perspective.
- 360-degree car interiors.
- Lots of interactive elements in the car models.
- Realistic physics and sounds effects.
- A mechanic with lots of upgrade options for your cars.
- Interactive gas station.
- Exciting missions in the form of quests, arcade challenges, and races.
- Dynamic day-night cycle.
  
Tips:
1. Buy new cars and upgrade them to win new races.
2. Don't go too fast in the city - drive carefully.
3. Watch out for the cops - they'll give you a ticket if they catch you speeding.
4. Pay attention to interactive tips and dialog boxes.
5. Don't forget to gas up your car at the gas station.
6. Bribes are cheaper than official tickets.
7. You can make extra money by picking up cab fares or working for the mob.
8. Obey the rules of the road.
   
Play the beta versions. Follow us!
Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.
  
Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!
  
https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGames
https://vk.com/oppana_games

comments: It's an really enjoyable game but I wish there were a couple of changes. One off those changes is that they added a gear lever or an option in the setting to have one. This is one when your breaking and coming to a stop you don't end up driving backwards. The other change this game could have is to be able to turn the person faster instead of having to swipe on the screen multiple times just to turn around. Other than that I love this game

Yes, I know it is in beta but it is very buggy. I get stuck in the ground, the car camera glitches out and that is only SOME of the experiences I've had. The Demon is WAYYYYY too drifty. Please try to fix these issues by the next upcoming updates. I will rate 3 stars (for now.)

This is very cool and addicting car driving game but please make an option for adjusting and customizing game control button's size and position. Then I will give this review 5 stars. It is very hard to turn the vehicle on steering wheel option due to its smaller size. And please add vehicle customisation like vinyls, paint jobs, spoilers, lips, skirts etc (to make the car looks cool and unique from other players).

The game is detailed good, atleast it's the first time I've experienced such detailed car simulater game. Also it's quests are easy and interesting. Graphics are also great. But there's a bit problem in it. We can only get out of the car in first-person view. I'd like it if you give a button to exit the car in. Third person view(back of car view). Some of the games effects are derived from NFS Most Wanted, I noticed that. But overall I loved this game. Also it's offline.

It is a good game , but I think there should be cars like Toyota fortuner, innova and rolls royce. There should taxi in which we will also be able to hire and there should be more mafia missions , this are the things that I would recommend you to add at the next update. But this game is a really good game. please add the( rolls royce phantom model) add this rolls royce car because this car would make the game more interesting.please add this car by the next update , and the game is interesting

title: Photo Warp
description:
Enormous amount of fun, craziness, creativity and laughing with your photos!
Create super funny caricatures and GIFs of yourself or joke your friends with this cool photo editor app for free!

Make yourself skinnier, buff your face up or enlarge any body part that might need some enlargement and don’t forget to make funny GIFs from your face changes for free! ;)
Or go crazy and have fun putting several pounds of fat on your friends or giving them the biggest cheese-eating grin you can imagine.

It's okay but it's not that good. It's hard to even edit it. You have to press hard on the screen too. And it barely gives any options.

comments: This game is a wonderful offline game. I have no signal at my job. The signal strength literally has the circle with a slash through it and this game is still 100% playable. The controls are easy, you get skins for your weapons, and you can even purchase a battle pass if you want more rewards. The only downside is that they always ask if you want to purchase a certain gun after each game you win, but it's not overwhelmingly annoying. Perfect offline game!

This game is one of the best zombie game I have ever played but it's has some probs though. First the guns are too expensive they are really too expensive, and you can't even play a level twice like you can't go back to the level you played before 🤦that's annoying, and the free trial for different guns will just keep giving me the same gun, that's even more annoying, please try and improve your game thanks

Been playing it 4 ovr a yr. now & only spent @ least $15 to $20 on the game,but watched alot of commercials & advertisment. It's a hard game until u get down to the last few guns in the gun category. I'm close to the 5000 gold bars to get the last gun that u can get without spending $ for a gun,it took me awhile 2 get 2 where I'm @ but can't wait 2 👀 what kind of damage it will do. 👁 suggest that any 1 should 👎 load the game & give it a try & u got 2 hav patients. A must.

This is a good game to play different levels of play and location's with plenty of zombies and creatures to kill with a variety of weapons and boosts that you can upgrade to 😰 except it's got a few glitches that need sorting out !!! Keeps turning itself off 😡 annoying 😡😡 even more irritating does not play videos all the way through so you can't get gold or double your winnings have to keep reloading all the time and it freezes alot 💩

Lost my data for a few days and had downloaded Dead Target because it's played offline. I was expecting much but was really impressed with how great the graphics look. It's a great game although a little bit to much blood for me but still couldn't stop(Throwing Grenades at Zombies🧟‍♀️).I'm sure some things could be a little better but hey , I was just really happy that I was able to even play something offline. 👍🧟‍♀️🤯

title: Pick Me Up™
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a ride share driver? 

Pick up and drop off customers to earn money and level up. Explore the world and discover new monuments.

How To Play:

- Tap and hold to drive
- Release to brake
- Avoid crashing
- Collect cash and unlock cool cars


Subscription Terms

VIP Access offers a weekly subscription for $5.99 after a 3 day free trial. Upon purchase of this subscription, you will immediately receive: 3 elite cars, 200% in-game cash earned, 250 in-game cash bonus daily and remove all ads. This is an auto-renewable subscription. The payment is charged to your account after purchase confirmation. Your subscription is renewed unless you turn it off at least 24 hours before the period ends. Your account will be charged for renewal as well. See below links for more information.

The prices are set for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency.

Canceling your Subscription

Please visit this link: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481?hl=en&co=GENIE.Platform%3DAndroid

For our privacy policy visit: http://tastypill.com/privacypolicy
For our terms of service visit: http://tastypill.com/tos

For any additional question, please contact us at: help@tastypill.com

comments: Honestly the game is so easy. It has a little bit excitement. But I love the game... There is also one problem with this game. It is after a level I just completed it will have an add. In each of level I complete. Please please please try to fix the problem. That's all. However the game is not so bad. Thanks.🙂

I love this game soo much because if you dont have data this be ur side but the matter is the add is so long the car is like following the line i mean is if someone in the car and just ask can we go to mall and bla2 thats why just follow the line but i wish if i dont have job like no want need a car i can drive around the place but than no i love this game so much but for me just that and one thing i just dont hate this app but just want to share everyone have a mistake so yaa..😉 And stay safe

This is a good game to play when you have nothing to do. But just 3 problems...1 is that everytime you finish a level there is ALWAYS an add. SO ANNOYING. 2 is that after a few levels the game always shuts down on it's own. And 3..when we do those turnings, the car just goes and dashes my car; and the computer says that I loose points! So unfair, but other than that the game is fun. Please try to fix these problems..Thank you! 😊😊😀😊

This game is amazing. When I pass get this ad I feel that this ad is not so good and the game also but the letter I am wrong when I will download this game I played the game so much that I reach so many levels in 2 minutes I also suggest that please download this game and enjoy your Quarantine time in home, u don't have to do anything in home or somewhere play this game in your home with your family in this quarantine time .

Great game guys, this game totally deserves 5 stars from me l guess...& l noticed that this game has less ads than the other games. So, well done for that, this game is very relaxing to play & l'm telling all this by the way l feel during playing this.so, love it..but, sometimes l crash the car but, l wount blame my foolishness on you guys or the game... it's clear that l need to improve my driving skills...okay anyway Good job guys keep up the grate work & we want more awesome games like this.

title: WildCraft: Animal Sim Online 3D
description:
Explore nature as a wild animal and raise a family in the wilderness in Wildcraft, a new RPG adventure set in a huge 3D landscape!

Start your adventure as a wolf, fox, lynx and more, and take your family on a new adventure. Play with friends in multiplayer games and form animal families to protect your cubs from enemies. Unlock new animal breeds as your family legacy grows in Wildcraft!

WILDCRAFT FEATURES:

Choose Animal Breeds
- Start your adventure as a:
- Wolf
- Fox
- Lynx
- And more!

Raise a Family
- Animal simulator: Customize each family member by name, gender, fur color, bark, eyes, body size, and more!
- Raise a family: Have up to six cubs per family and continue your legacy.
- Animal simulator lets you leave your current family to start a new one.

Explore a 3D World
- Explore the world and travel to unique locations.
- Adventure the wild and survive the elements in summer, winter, spring and fall.

Battle Enemies
- Battle dangerous enemies as a wild animal and protect your family.
- Unlock fighting achievements after defeating specific enemies.

Online Adventure Games
- Play with friends, explore the world and battle enemies.
- Battle enemies with friends to effectively protect your family.

Raise a family as one of your favorite wild animals and explore a huge 3D world. Join friends to battle more enemies, or take them on alone to make your adventure more challenging in Wildcraft.

Download today to play as a wolf, fox, lynx and more!

recentChanges:
New playable animal - Tiger! And a new location - Jungles - with amazing flora and fauna! Also, a new jungle den.
Legendary skins and action for rhino and parrot transformation.
New rare skins for all transformations.
More of den items in a jungle style.
WildClub: cheetah's and tiger's skins, pet rhino, new accessories for wolf, fox, and lynx.
comments: I love this game so much! I only had it for a week and its already my favorite. I have a couple of things that could be fixed though. Usually when I get a friend and I check my friends list they are not there which can be annoying. Sometimes when you try to load into a multiplayer game the map randomly isn´t downlaoded and it kicks you out of the game which is annoying too. It would be really cool if there was a friend and clan chat when your not in game. But overall this is amazing. 5 stars.

Very amazing game. This game is very simple. You basically hunt animals and eat them to level up (if your sensitive to blood there's none in this game). You can even raise a cute family! [Maximum family members is 6). You can also change your animal, and it won't loose your progress! You can change it to a fox, bear, cheetah, crocodile, etc! HAPPY HALLOWEEN 🎃!

I love this game but could you help me get on multiplayer because when I go on multiplayer it kicks me out and says Error connection to server timed out and that happened for 2 years! And it happened for no reason. I could not fix it! And it's still happening! Has that ever happened to you? And when 1 day passes I can go on multiplayer but if I exit and try going back it does the same as I told you at the second sentence.

It's hard to control the eagle with flying, otherwise the controls are pretty darn good. Though I do know my phone is somewhat small and it's hard to simulate flight. I do think they should (if possible) add more plant variation like with bushes in certain maps. Maybe an aquatic update too? As someone who used to play when there was 3 play able animals, it's awesome to see this game grow! Sorry if I set my expectations too high or low, I just want to see the game improve for everyone.

I love it, it is such a great game I have so much playing with outher players and by my self. But, there is some lag if you go on top of the land a little bit behind the poltel you can go throught that bit of land, be stuck there and have to tellport to your den. Beside that it is a great game. (In the clacis one.)

title: NordVPN – fast VPN app for privacy & security
description:
Get ready for an ultra-fast VPN connection with NordLynx – our next-gen protocol based on WireGuard®! Download NordVPN to enjoy fast, private, and secure internet in an instant. That’s an easy-to-use VPN app for Android, trusted by millions of users worldwide.

🥇 The world’s #1 VPN brand
⭐️ Recommended by CNET

✔ Surf the web truly privately
When you’re connected to VPN, no one can see what websites you visit or files you download. Not even us – we have a strict no-log policy approved by independent auditors. 

✔ Enjoy high-speed connection with NordLynx
It’s our brand new VPN protocol built on the backbone of WireGuard to bring you blazing speeds and bulletproof privacy. 

✔ Stay secure on Wi-Fi hotspots
A coffee shop serves the best espresso but its Wi-Fi is unsecured? Use NordVPN to secure your internet connection and get stuff done without worrying about your information being leaked.

✔ Shield yourself from cyber threats 
NordVPN’s CyberSec feature blocks malicious websites and protects your device from accidentally joining a botnet zombie army.

✔ Hide your IP address
Connect to VPN and change your location in a blink – it’s almost like traveling on a virtual express train! Our server network covers 58 countries to choose from.

✔ Guard your sensitive data
With NordVPN, your online traffic travels through a secure encrypted tunnel. This way, it’s out of reach for cyber bad guys who are eager to snatch your private data.

FEATURES

• Powerful encryption for top-grade security
• VPN protocols: OpenVPN, NordLynx based on WireGuard 
• Unlimited data for internet freedom
• 5500+ servers worldwide for turbo speeds
• Protection of 6 devices with a single account
• Double VPN for ultimate privacy
• VPN auto-connect for effortless online protection
• 24/7 customer support by our award-winning team

If you want to go more advanced...

• Split tunneling: select apps you don’t want to run through the encrypted VPN connection
• Custom DNS: set a custom DNS server address
• Switch between TCP and UDP protocols
• Specialty servers optimized for your individual needs

Ready to experience a better internet?

Online security is just a tap away – install the app and start your 7-day free trial. Wind down, connect to NordVPN, and enjoy safe and private internet access wherever you go.

WireGuard® is a registered trademark of Jason A. Donenfeld.

summary: Ready to download the VPN app and enjoy fast and secure internet in an instant?
developerAddress: Aquilino de la Guardia Street No. 8, Panama City, Panama
recentChanges: This summer, we’ve introduced Nord Account, which unified the login and sign-up across all Nord products. This release includes updated login and sign-up flows, but you don’t need to do anything about it – your current account details are automatically transferred to Nord Account. Just lay back, relax, and continue enjoying online security. If you decide to expand your protection outside VPN, your Nord Account will work like magic when getting on board with other Nord security products.
comments: The app is usually great, I'd have given it a 5 star rating, but lately it's been a problem where it doesn't connect to the VPN server it stays on an infinite loop and I have to force stop both my browser and my NordVPN app, then restart them both just to get it to work. The app is still having lots of issues, when it works it works pretty good, but when it's not it's a real headache to use. Please fix the app, there's going to need to be a good update.

Quality has been getting worse lately. Pro: can set auto connect for wifi only. Com: Shade notification's "Disconnect" doesn't work, just auto reconnects! Pro: VPN... Con: Services like OneDrive and Photos stop working reliably due to provider blacklisting. What's the point? VPN's may have outlived their useful life, but this app could still be better than it is.

Unlike the paid websites saying that this service works in China, reality is that it can't connect from china for many months already !!! Their support is a useless chat not that recommends you to download OpenVPN with a zip containing config files. Really? Edit: to reply the dev, I have other paid VPNs that always work in China, without using a third party app. And why use OpenVPN app when own NordVPN app handles OpenVPN protocol? Total non-sens...

Updated: Nothing but issues with this service. Either the app or the service itself is complete junk. I've had nothing but connection issues using other apps like Wyze cam while using thIs VPN. I have tried the split tunneling and it doesn't work. I can never connect to my security cams while running Nord.I have switched back to my previous VPN service Torguard and everything works perfectly. Goodbye Nord, you got my money but never again.

After the latest update the app doesn't work anymore. When I want to log in I'm being taken to my browser to log in there. That doesn't activate the app though. The app is now rendered completely useless. Please fix ASAP or let me know how I get my money back.

title: NOAA Weather Radar Live & Alerts
description:
Get a powerful yet easy-to-use weather station right on your device with NOAA Weather Radar Live & Alerts. Real-time animated weather radar images on a highly interactive map enhanced with severe weather warnings provide accurate weather forecasts that will prevent bad weather from taking you by surprise.

The app reflects accurate real-time weather conditions and provides you with the detailed meteo information you need to know: current and "Feels Like" temperature, the chance of precipitation and humidity info, wind speed and wind direction, pressure changes and more. Customize your weather report according to your taste – choose the information you would like to receive!

Take a look at current weather conditions or take the most of the top-notch functionality of the weather radar. Get a push notification whenever an alert is issued (tornadoes, flood warnings, snow storms, and more) without opening the app!

Real-time animated meteo radar on a highly interactive terrain or satellite map enhanced with severe weather warnings and alerts will meet the needs of even the most demanding users. Rainy, snowy, stormy or cloudy weather, you’ll be prepared for it all!

Short-term (24-hour) and long-term (7-day) accurate weather forecast for any location.

Units of measurement:
🌟 Pressure in inches, mm, kPa or mbar,
🌟 Fahrenheit/Celsius and Miles/Kilometers,
🌟 Wind speed in mph, km/h, m/s, knots, Beaufort.

World Weather Map:
🚩 Explore the weather on an interactive map. Weather icons will let you know what the local temperature is throughout the world. Tap on them to get more details.

Easy location search:
🚩 Toggle between cities and spy on weather in other parts of the world. Bookmarked locations will help you quickly switch to your favorite spots, check today’s weather or find out the forecast for tomorrow. 

Radar, Satellite and Precipitation Forecast:
🚩 Get real-time snow and rain tracking, mixed precipitation data, and cloud cover in high resolution and vivid colors by switching between radar, satellite and rain maps.

Customizable overlays:
🚩 Choose background maps and the number of frames; adjust opacity and loop speed for the overlays.

Resizable widget:
🚩 Add a nice customizable widget to your screen and get the live-updated weather information you want to know without opening the app.

More handy options for the best user experience!


National Weather Service watches and warnings are shown on the map as interactive warning boxes highlighting the territories they're active for. Tap any to get the card with the full alert text.

Coverage Info:
Radar images: the US (Continental US, Alaska, Hawaii, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico), Mexico (northern), Canada (southern), Australia, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Italy (northern and north-western), Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Finland, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Norway, Poland, Andorra, Japan, Taiwan.

Precipitation Forecast, satellite images, and detailed weather info are available worldwide.

By downloading this application, you agree to the Apalon Apps End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.
You can choose from different subscription options.
* A subscription with a free trial will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the free trial period.
* Cancel a free trial or subscription anytime through your account settings on the Google Play Store and continue to enjoy the premium content until the end of the free-trial period or paid subscription!
 
Go Premium and get some nice extra features:

♛ Alerts for unlimited number of saved locations;
♛ Higher Accuracy precipitation forecast option;
♛ Hurricane tracker for the whole duration of your plan;
♛ Lightning tracker with timely lightning alerts;
♛ Ad-free!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4

recentChanges:
Check out the new NOAA Weather Radar Live & Alerts release that includes:

- Temperature Map: see how the temperature will change in the coming hours near you and across the globe.

Thank you for your continued support! Help us leverage your experience: share your questions or suggestions via support@apalon.com.
comments: I had been using free version for a long time. As a truck driver, being able to look a few hours ahead to track radar was very helpful to timing travel in mountainous areas. Since i loaded an update, it's worthless. The radar only shows for a short time prior to present. It no longer shows any future projections for radar movement. Way to ruin a good resource for weather info. Certainly not considering a subscription now.

It's not free! It's an expensive trial. Don't waste your time. There are too many free apps with less ads that do way better job than this, which was obviously developed by a programmer in the first grade. use 1weather, had less intrusive ads or use the weather channel. This is for people who buy their first Android phones and don't know any better which is why they have no money

I came to this after Dark Sky's sold out, my big complaint is that it does not offer future predictions on the radar, it only offers current and past. I pay for the yearly membership since I'm a truck driver and its a tax write off and it has other benifits that are helpful to me. I'd love to see this feature added, and if it does it would change my rating to 5 stars.

After my disappointing experience w/the Accuweather and WeatherUnderground apps, I avoid paid upgrades and memberships. So if you do not upgrade and you can tolerate the aggressive pop-up advertising, then in my opinion the free version of the NOAA app is good enough to provide you w/a quick forecast and temperature reading. That's the case for now until paid membership becomes mandatory in the inevitable future. But always, keep your eyes on the skies.

I depend on this app for real time weather. Having a farm with horses it's nice to look and see bad weather that pops up real fast. Direct TV goes down and I get no info on the severity of bad weather without th[s app. The local weather channel gives no up to date even if it is up in running. I even have a NOAA weather radio that is my back up. Awesome app!!!!!

title: Credit Karma - Free Credit Scores & Reports
description:
From spotting identity theft to getting personalized loan and credit card recommendations. Ready to make financial progress?

• Check your free credit scores – Take a look at your free credit reports to learn what affects your credit score and how you can take control.

• Explore the Relief Roadmap – Connect with government stimulus programs, unemployment benefits, debt relief opportunities, loan options and more.

• Credit Karma Savings – You worked hard for your money.  Now Credit Karma Savings makes your money work harder for you.  Open a savings account* in minutes and start earning a high-yield interest rate that's optimized across a network of 800+ banks.

• Free ID monitoring – We help you spot potential identity theft and give you tips for keeping your personal information safer.

• Free credit monitoring – Get credit alerts when we see important changes happen to your Equifax or TransUnion credit reports.

• Personalized Approval Odds – See which credit card and personal loan offers you’re more likely to get before applying.

• Credit card choices – Browse great credit card offers based on your unique credit profile.

• All things auto – Tune up your auto loan, save on car insurance, see open recalls and find vehicle records.

• Home sweet home – Calculate how much home you can afford, see personalized home loan offers and get a mortgage pre-qualification letter.

• Credit Karma Tax® – Filing your 2019 state and federal tax returns with the IRS is 100% free from start to finish, plus you’ll get our Maximum Refund Guarantee**, Audit Defense*** and dedicated support.

• Personal loan shopping – Whether you want to refinance credit card debt or borrow for an emergency, we’ll show you personalized offers based on your credit profile.

• Search unclaimed money – See if any of the more than $40 billion in unclaimed money has your name on it. 

• Financial calculators – You can see how different actions impact your finances with our free simple loan calculator, debt repayment calculator, mortgage refinancing calculator and more.

Join more than 100 million members and get all these features, and more, for free. Download the Credit Karma app now.

DISCLAIMER

*Banking services provided by MVB Bank, Inc., Member FDIC. Maximum balance and transfer limits apply. Maximum 6 withdrawals per monthly statement cycle.

**If you receive a larger federal tax refund amount or owe less in federal taxes using the same Tax Return Information when filing an amended return through another online tax preparation service, then you may be eligible to receive the difference in the refund or tax amount owed up to $100 (minimum $25) in the form of a gift card from Credit Karma Tax®. For details and eligibility, see https://www.creditkarma.com/tax/programterms#1.

***For details and eligibility, see https://www.creditkarma.com/lp/audit-defense-terms/.  Exclusions apply.

comments: I like the new layout and look. However, I would give 5 stars if I didn't have to search for what comes through on the alert notifications. Example, "there's a special loan offer", where?! I have search for it, when the app should go right to the information that is on alert notification, and not just the home page. Many alerts I just ignore, because I become frustrated trying to find them. Just open directly to them once pressed, otherwise I'm just wasting time seeing the same information.

I really love this app and the website. It's convenient and easy to use. My only complaint right now it that no matter how many times I click on "Recommendations" and scroll through it, it ALWAYS says there is 1 waiting. It's been going on for a while and it's on both desktop and mobile, so I know it's not just this latest update to the app. I don't like the advertising of the credit cards all the time but I get it, to keep the app free you need to have ads, no problem. Recommend me stuff all the time, I don't care, just register that I've seen it once I have.

Great app, I mean ausome app, in less than a year, this app has helped me get all three of my credit scores boosted. They were all between 510-530 and now, only a year later all three range from 622-643. So this app has done wonders. After a year of doing what the app said I went from having no credit to having 3 credit cards and owning a house. SO CREDIT KARMA GETS A 10 STAR RATING FROM ME. I USED TO SPEND MONEY AS FAST AS IT HIT MY POCKET NOW I HAVE OVER 10,000 IN SAVINGS AND I'M A PACK RAT.

Good app, but this latest update sucks. I don't like the new UI, and it feels slower now. And one thing that's been bugging me forever, when you open the app and it displays where you enter your pin, raise all the numbers up. It's way too low. But the in app UI sucks now. Change it back please. It was easier on the eyes before and easier to read

I've been monitoring my credit for a couple years now with Credit Karma, but this is thee worst update they've done! Not to mention, your score in the app will never be what a lender pulls. So I just use it to monitor credit card usage and any collections. Other than that, the app is garbage. Edit to include CK's response: I already know that. I am informing others, because clearly your formula isn't accurate. And if it's not accurate... it's not useful.

title: Maps - Navigate & Explore
description:
Navigate your world faster and easier with Google Maps.  Over 220 countries and territories mapped and hundreds of millions of businesses and places on the map.  Get real-time GPS navigation, traffic, and transit info, and explore local neighborhoods by knowing where to eat, drink and go - no matter what part of the world you’re in.

Get there faster with real-time updates
• Beat traffic with real-time ETAs and traffic conditions
• Catch your bus, train, or ride-share with real-time transit info
• Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents, and road closures

Discover places and explore like a local
• Discover local restaurant, events, and activities that matter to you
• Know what’s trending and new places that are opening in the areas you care about
• Decide more confidently with “Your match,” a number on how likely you are to like a place
• Group planning made easy.  Share a shortlist of options and vote in real-time
• Create lists of your favorite places and share with friends
• Follow must-try places recommended by local experts, Google, and publishers
• Review places you’ve visited. Add photos, missing roads and places.

More experiences on Google Maps
• Offline maps to search and navigate without an internet connection
• Street View and indoor imagery for restaurants, shops, museums and more
• Indoor maps to quickly find your way inside big places like airports, malls and stadiums

* Some features not available in all countries

* Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles

comments: I've been using Google Maps for years, and update my timeline every day so I've got an accurate tracking record of where I've been. And then, today, I find that most of the data for this and previous years has suddenly disappeared (it was there yesterday). Most days now have no places visited and I just don't understand where all the data has gone. I've tried clearing cache, restarting phone, uninstalling and reinstalling the app - nothing. At disappointed.

This had been one of the most useful apps I ever used. But for the last several weeks it is not responding. I had done all possible troublshooting and failed to update the app. I also sent feedback and yet to receive a reply. I also cannot contribute to google local guide, where I crosssd level 8. Looking forward to your support. (15 Oct 2020) Still unable to use this app! (20 Oct 2010)

Really like Google maps it is accurate and normally doesn't glitch out. But for the last 3 weeks it has been giving me trouble. It won't give detailed directions while driving; basically goes turn right then turn left, with out giving how far until I need to turn or what street I need to turn on. I tried going through settings to find a solution but nothing has worked. I have searched through page after page on Google to find a solution but have not found one yet. I have a Samsung S20 5G.

Stopped working. I have been using this app for I can't even tell you how many years and recently just stopped working. doesn't find any of the addresses I'm searching to go to and won't even find my own location. ***I did uninstall updates and it seems to currently be working again without the updates. Send it to me to an article isn't what I'm looking for from the developer. I'm looking for them to fix their update.

Terrible! Google maps has been my go to for years on every phone I've had now over the past week the maps won't load the addresses and won't give directions. I have uninstalled then reinstalled for under a minute temporary fix then it does it all over again. I can't get any numbers or find my way unless I zoom into the map and follow my blue icon showing where I am. If I didn't know how to read maps ill be f***ed. This is bad.

title: Geometry Dash World
description:
Geometry Dash is back with a brand new adventure! New levels, new music, new monsters, new everything! 

Flex your clicky finger as you jump, fly and flip your way through dark caves and spiky obstacles. Discover the lands, play online levels and find the secrets hidden within the World of Geometry Dash!

• Rhythm-based Action Platforming!
• Ten unique levels with music from Dex Arson, Waterflame and F-777!
• Play daily quests and earn rewards!
• Play online levels created by the Geometry Dash community!
• Unlock unique icons and colors to customize your character!
• Fly rockets, flip gravity and much more!
• Use practice mode to sharpen your skills!
• Challenge yourself with the near impossible!

Approved by RubRub \ (•◡•) /

comments: Ok, unlike Geometry Dash Lite this game is not laggy at all, plus there is so much more to do in this game! I'm in love with it! This game is super addicting and fun! I would highly recommend this to people who like doing things to the beat and like hard challenges! ( Disclaimer, you can't make your own levels, but I'm fine with that )

This game is awesome. There are a ton of creative levels and the music really gets you pumped when you start completing large chunks of a level. My only problem is that it really isn't receiving updates and there isn't as much stuff as there is in the OG Geometry Dash. Honestly I just want the game to receive a bit more attention and I'll be fine

This game is so awsome i can only text short but this is 100% cool right but actually there is a secret in GDW plus there was alot of secrets in this game but actually i cant get the medal called "Cold As Ice" right guys and use some headphones so you can hear some cool song like 100% cool remix but i want to tell guys, im not a pro im a 5%pro and i can only finish easy,na and medium mode but i cant beat hard mode and modes right and thats it okay!!!!! I love Geometry Dash okay!!!!!

This game is so fun! There are tons of obstacles on the way and the songs are so good! It gets harder on the way all though I had this game before it's as exciting as the first time I played it. I am Aiyah and this is opinion of this game.

This is a really cool gd game, and it gives you more features than Lite. It allows access to some featured levels, your previously downloaded levels via save bug, etc. I really want to have a new island, however. The amount of stuff is still very limited because the levels don't update. Keep making updates and new games, because you are doing pretty good 👍

title: Tiles Hop: EDM Rush!
description:
HOT! HOT! HOT!

Monstercat is going online. Play your favorite songs with our newest character. Try to get the highest scores with the FANTASTIC game ever!

Heard About EDM Tiles? With Tiles Hop: EDM Rush! you can play various types of music, from beautiful Piano, Guitar songs to Rock and EDM masterpieces. 

How to play

1. Touch, Hold and Drag the ball to make it jump on the Tiles. 
2. Don't Miss the Tiles! 
3. You can now upload your own songs to play
4. Enjoy the awesome music and addictive challenges designed for each song.

The Ball will jump on the Beats Drop. Listen to the magic beat, follow the rhythm and use your musical reflexes to guide the ball from tiles to tiles. Do not Tap! This is not a Tap Tap game.
Don't forget to make insane combos and beat your friend's scores!

Hit Songs + Ball Game +  Tiles = Awesomeness
Game features
- Auto-generated content: upload your favorite songs to bounce to the music
- One-touch control, easy to play
- Breathtaking 3D visual and effects
- 30+ absolutely beautiful and fun songs to relax
- 20+ Different backgrounds to truly bring you a new experience every plays!
- Collect beautiful skins for your dancing balls
- Beat your own top score and dare your best friends for a challenge
- Share your record with your friends, and compare it with worldwide players on the ranking list!
- Connect with Facebook account and sync the saved progress across multiple devices

Bounce off the magic music tiles, listen to the beat, and make as many hops as you can in this mind-blowing music game now for Free!

This game will create the whole new experience for music game fan.

Tiles Hop: EDM Rush! is totally Free! Play this EDM music Running Game now!

comments: It is an amazing game and it is really relaxing. I was fully depressed last month when the exams came, for 2 days I played this and then it was just so smooth. In this game everything is fine except for the ads. I also want to highlight that I also want there real voice. Fix it pls. Other than that there is no problems with the game. And as this is a very relaxing game I would like to tell you all who can download, to download this asap, so that the whole world will be fully relaxing.

I like this app and the songs are really many, but i have a few suggestions. First of all it would be better if they put their real singing voice for the artists in the songs.The second one, there are some missing songs i like it would be an horner to add a little more songs. So that's my suggestions. Now the thing i like (not the ONLY thing) is that the one that says we can play our own songs. I really like that we can play different song. Love this app!!! The graphics are pretty good, but the only reason why I gave this app four stars is because that I just don't really like watching ads. But don't worry Tiles Hop, I still haven't deleted it yet! The thing about the adds is 1, there quite boring to look at, number 2, ads aren't really pleasent for me to hear either. And finally, number 3, I don't like any types of ads no matter what. So can you PLEASE fix this? I really want to take a break from ads for now.

This is the first music game I love, better than cooler hop 3D and I just downloaded it. I can now see what 100 million people download it. Please fix this it🙏🏽

Its so much fun the fact of the game its like making a song but a game and it match the beat of the song. ITS worth it buying it now! But here the thing there is some missing song that I would like butt in the future the might fix that, but still worth buying it!
